<a2><b3>使用 GameMaker</b3></a2><br4>
<b0>"description":</b0> The description of the last uploaded file.
<b0>"description":</b0> 上传的最后一个文件的描述。
<b0>"errorString":</b0> returns an Error String for any error.
<b0>"errorString":</b0> 返回的错误消息。
<b0>"id":</b0> The id which was returned from the called function.
<b0>"id":</b0> 返回被调用的函数的id，
<b0>"resultString":</b0> This holds a string which is the data blob returned from the cloud.
<b0>"resultString":</b0> 从云端返回的二进制数据。
<b0>"status":</b0> This holds the status code, where a negative value denotes an error, a description of which will be contained in the “errorString”.
<b0>"status":</b0> 这是状态码，其中负值表示错误，错误详情包含在“errorstring”中。
<b0>&&, ||, ^^ (and, or and xor)</b0> - Combine Boolean values to give either true or false.
<b0>&&, ||, ^^（与、或和异或）</b0> - 将两个布尔值结合在一起判断是真还是否。
<b0>++, --</b0> - Add or subtract <i1>one</i1> from a value.
<b0>++a</b0> will increment the variable and return the incremented value.
<b0>++a</b0> 递增变量并返回增加后的值。
<b0>+, -, *, /</b0> - Add, subtract, multiply and divide.
<b0>-</b0>: negates the next value
<b0><, <=, ==, !=, >, >=</b0> - These are comparisons and can only give a <t1>true</t1> or <t2>false</t2> result (where true can also be interpreted as 1, and false as 0).
<b0><, <=, ==, !=, >, >=</b0> - 这些都是比较运算，且只会得出 <t1>true</t1> 或者 <t2>false</t2> 的结果（true = 1，false = 0）。
<b0>=</b0> - Used to assign a value to a variable.
<b0>=</b0> - 用来给一个变量赋值。
<b0>About <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1>:</b0> Gives information about this version of <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2>, including the product key and the user it's registered to.
<b0>关于 <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1>:</b0> 关于该版本 <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> 的信息，包括产品密钥、注册用户。
<b0>Add 添加</b0>.
<b0>Anchor</b0>: The Anchor letter in the IDE name for the keyboard shortcut.
<b0>锚</b0>: 在集成开发环境里的锚字母键盘快捷键。
<b0>Be careful with your while loops!</b0> You can easily make infinite loops, in which case your game will hang and not react to any user input anymore.
<b0>请小心你的while循环！</b0> 它很容易就能造成无限循环，在这种情况下你的游戏将被挂起并且不再响应任何的用户输入。

<b0>Bookmarks:</b0> From here you can access any of the bookmarks that you may have set in your code and scripts (you can bookmark a script or code action using <i1><Shift> + <Control> + <NUM></i1> , where <i2><NUM></i2> is a number from 0 to 9 on the keyboard).
<b0>书签:</b0> 从这里你可以访问任何设置了书签的代码或脚本 (你可以用<i1><Shift> + <Control> + <NUM></i1> 为脚本或代码设置书签，其中 <i2><NUM></i2> 是键盘上 0 - 9 之中的一个数字)。
<b0>Change</b0>.
<b0>Change 修改</b0>.
<b0>Clear</b0>.
<b0>Clear 清空</b0>.
<b0>Collapse Resource Tree:</b0> .
<b0>折叠资源树:</b0> .
<b0>Confirm:</b0> Clicking this button will close the path editor and save any changes you have made.
<b0>确认 : </b0>点击这个按钮会保存当前路径设置并且关闭路径编辑器。
<b0>Contents:</b0> Use this command to bring up the help file.
<b0>帮助文档:</b0> 用此命令打开帮助文件。
<b0>Create Application:</b0> Once your game is ready you will probably want to give it to others to play!
<b0>生成应用程序:</b0> 一旦你的游戏制作好，就可以使用此命令创建独立程序。
<b0>Debug:</b0> From here you can pause or play the game being debugged, or you can toggle a breakpoint on or off.
<b0>Debug:</b0>在这里你可以暂停或者启动你正在调试的游戏，或者你也可以把断点切换成打开或者关闭的状态。
<b0>Delete:</b0> Deletes the currently selected resource (or group of resources) from the resource tree.
<b0>删除:</b0> 删除当前选择的资源 (或资源组) 。
<b0>Delete</b0>.
<b0>Delete 删除</b0>.
<b0>Demos:</b0> This will allow you to view demo files that come with <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1>.
<b0>演示:</b0> 允许你查看 <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> 演示文件。
<b0>Duplicate:</b0> This makes a copy of the currently selected resource in the resource tree.
<b0>复制：</b0> 创建当前选择资源的副本。
<b0>Duplicate</b0>.
<b0>Duplicate 复制</b0>.
<b0>Events</b0>.
<b0>Exit:</b0> We know that making games is fun and addictive, but you need to eat and sleep sometimes!
<b0>退出:</b0> 我们知道做游戏非常有趣而且容易上瘾，但你需要吃和睡！
<b0>Expand Resource Tree:</b0> Each section (and sub-folder within) of the resource tree can be collapsed when not in use to allow more space on screen for other resources.
<b0>展开资源树:</b0> 资源树中的节点在屏幕没有空间显示的时候会折叠，
<b0>Export Project:</b0> Exports your project as a <i1>compressed GameMaker file</i1> with the format <b2>*.gmz</b2>.
<b0>导出工程:</b0> 导出 <b2>*.gmz</b2> <i1>压缩格式 Gamemaker 文件</i1>。

<b0>Extension Packages:</b0> Use this to show a list of the <a1>Legacy Extension Packages</a1> that you have saved to your <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> folder and to show the help file for specific packages (if they include one).
<b0>扩展包:</b0> 用此命令列出已经保存在 <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> 文件夹的 <a1>扩展包</a1> 清单，并且显示特定扩展包的帮助文件 (如果有的话)。
<b0>File:</b0> Here you can attempt to <i1>reconnect</i1> the debug module to your game should the connection be lost, or exit the debug module (which will not exit your game, only the module).
<b0>File:</b0>当你的游戏和调试模块连接断掉的时候，你可以在此尝试<i1>重连接</i1>，或者也可以在此选择退出调试模块。（不过这样不会退出游戏，仅仅是调试模块而已）
<b0>Find Resource:</b0> This searches through the resource tree looking for the name of the resource that you request.
<b0>查找资源:</b0> 按照名称搜索资源。

<b0>Forum:</b0> This will connect you to the <b1>GameMaker Community</b1> (<b2>GMC</b2>) forum, where you can find help with any problem as well as tutorials, resources and much more all related to <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3>.
<b0>论坛:</b0> 会打开 <b1>GameMaker交流论坛</b1> (<b2>GMC</b2>)，在这里你可以找到任何问题的帮助如教程、资源或更多涉及到 <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3>的内容。
<b0>Friends Only</b0> - The game will only be visible in searches to you, your friends, and Steam administrators.
<b0>只允许好友可见</b0> - 你、Steam 管理员和你的好友可以看到。
<b0>GameMaker: Studio</b0> Preferences
<b0>GameMaker: Studio</b0> 首选项
<b0>Help:</b0> Opens up your browser, taking you to the YoYo Games Helpdesk.
<b0>Help:</b0>打开你的浏览器，给你看YoYoGames官网的服务台。
<b0>Helpdesk:</b0> This link will take you to the YoYo Games Helpdesk and Knowledge Base where you can find additional tutorials and FAQs, as well as ask questions about the product.
<b0>服务台:</b0> 此链接将带你到 YoYo Games 服务台 和 知识库 中，在这里你可以找到更多的教程和常见问题解答，以及询问有关产品的问题。

<b0>Import:</b0> Here you can load up the compressed *.gmz project files and also import game files created with other versions of GameMaker, including GameMaker 6 (*.gm6), GameMaker 7 and 8 (*.gmk and *.gm81) as well as GameMaker 8.1 (*.gm81) and much older (*.gmd) files.
<b0>导入:</b0> 这个选项卡里你可以加载 *.gmz 工程或者导入其他版本 GameMaker 的文件,包括 GameMaker 6 (*.gm6)， GameMaker 7 和 8 (*.gmk 和 *.gm81) 以及 GameMaker 8.1 (*.gm81) 或者更老的 (*.gmd) 文件。
<b0>Import:</b0> Imports a <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> <b2>*.gmz</b2> compressed file (which will then be saved as a standard <b3>*.gmx</b3>) game file.
<b0>导入:</b0> 导入 <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> 的 <b2>*.gmz</b2> 格式文件 (将会被保存为标准的 <b3>*.gmx</b3> 格式)。
<b0>Insert Group:</b0> Inserts a sub-folder within the resource tree.
<b0>插入组:</b0> 在资源树插入一个新的子文件夹。
<b0>Insert...:</b0> inserts a new resource of the type currently selected.
<b0>插入...:</b0> 插入当前选择类型的新资源。.
<b0>Instance Creation Code</b0> As well as the code you insert into the events of an object, you can also add code to individual instances when you place them in the room.
<b0>实例创建时代码（Instance Creation Code）</b0> 正如你在对象的创建事件中加入的代码片段，你也可以给放置在房间中的对象实例，加入特有的脚本。
<b0>Key Bindings:</b0> This option opens the <b1>Key Binding Editor</b1> where you can redefine the <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> keyboard shortcuts.
<b0>热键设定:</b0> 此选项会打开 <b1>热键设定编辑器</b1>，在这里你可以重定义 <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> 的键盘快捷键，
<b0>Key</b0>: The key (or key combination) to be assigned to the shortcut command.
<b0>快捷键</b0>: 为命令分配的按键 (或组合键)。
<b0>Knowledge Base</b0>: This will take you to the <a1><i2>GameMaker</i2> Knowledge Base</a1> where you can find plenty of official information about the use of <i3>GameMaker</i3> products.
<b0>知识库</b0>: 这将会打开 <a1><i2>GameMaker</i2> 知识库</a1>，在这里你可以找到更多关于 <i3>GameMaker</i3> 产品的官方信息。
<b0>Licenses:</b0> This tab will display the <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> license, as well as all the various third party licenses of products that are used.
<b0>许可:</b0> 这个选项卡显示 <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> 的许可，以及所有使用的第三方产品的许可。
<b0>Merge</b0>.
<b0>Merge 合并</b0>.
<b0>NOTE:</b0> Audio groups can only be used when working with the normal audio system, but will not work with legacy audio.
<b0>注意:</b0> 音频组只能与新音频系统工作，但不会与传统音频工作。

<b0>NOTE:</b0> Before doing a final build of your project for release, you should always clear the Asset Compiler Cache (using the green "broom" icon at the top of the IDE) to ensure that all cached files are recreated and no stale files corrupt your final game.
<b0>注意:</b0> 在生成最终文件之前需要清理资源编辑缓存 (点击使用工具栏里的绿色 "扫帚" 图标)来确保生成最终游戏的正确性。
<b0>NOTE:</b0> Currently only Amazon <b1>WhisperSync</b1> is supported and you must activate it through the <a2> Android Tab</a2> of the Global Game Settings.

<b0>NOTE:</b0> Due to the way that this works internally, passing arrays to scripts may affect performance, especially if the array is very large.

<b0>NOTE:</b0> If you are resizing the application surface, these changes will not be registered until the start of the next draw frame, meaning that calling the <a1><t2>surface_get_width()</t2></a1> or <a3><t4>surface_get_height()</t4></a3> functions in the same event or step will return the previous values.
<b0>注：</b0>如果你重置应用表面层的大小，它不会马上发生改变，直至下一个绘制帧，这意味着在同一个事件或者步事件中使用 <a1><t2>surface_get_width()</t2></a1> 或者 <a3><t4>surface_get_height()</t4></a3> 函数将返回之前的值。
<b0>NOTE:</b0> If your HTML5 game uses a custom <t1>index.html</t1> and that sets the canvas to a fixed position then this function will have no effect on the window position.
<b0>注意:</b0> 如果你的 HTML5 游戏使用用户自定义的<t1>index.html</t1> ，并且设置画布（canvas）至固定的位置，那么这个函数在窗口位置将无效。

<b0>NOTE:</b0> Many of the watch windows (like Global, Local or Watches) will <b1>not</b1> update while the game is running, and will require that you pause the game or set a breakpoint before they are updated.
<b0>注意：</b0>许多监视窗口（例如全局，局部，或监视）<b1>并不会</b1>在游戏运行时更新，它们需要你暂停游戏或者在它们更新前设置断点。

tuv.seg: <b0>NOTE:</b0> On Windows8 SurfaceRT devices, there is a canvas limit of 2048x2048, which means the drawing canvas cannot go above those dimensions (neither with views, nor by setting the game window directly) otherwise your game graphics will be corrupted or degraded.

<i0><b1>请注意:</b1> GameMaker: Studio 使用 C++ 创建最终游戏。
<i0><b1>Rooms</b1></i0>: the space (levels) in which the objects are placed
<i0><b1>房间</b1></i0>: 放置物体的空间 (关卡)
<i0><b1>Scripts</b1></i0>: a script is a piece of code to which you give a name and use like a GML function
<i0><b1>脚本</b1></i0>: 脚本是一个代码块，你需要给它命名，然后像使用GML函数一样使用它们
<i0><b1>Shaders</b1></i0>: a shader is a combination of two "programs" written in a <i2>shader language</i2> to create graphical effects
<i0><b1>着色器</b1></i0>: 着色器组合两个程序写在一个 <i2>着色器语言</i2> 来创建图形效果
<i0><b1>Sounds</b1></i0>: can be used in games as either background music or as sound effects
<i0><b1>声音</b1></i0>: 可以用于游戏的背景音乐或音效
<i0><b1>Sprites</b1></i0>: images (often animated) that are used to represent the objects
<i0><b1>精灵</b1></i0>: 图像 (通常是动画)，用于代表物体
<i0><b1>Time lines</b1></i0>: can be used to control the precise moment in a game that things should happen
<i0><b1>时间轴</b1></i0>: 精确控制时间
<i0>GameMaker: Studio - Standard</i0> only permits you to export games for Windows, and the <i1>Professional</i1> version also permits you to compile for <b2>Windows 8</b2>.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio - 标准版</i0> 只允许导出windows游戏，而 <i1>专业版</i1> 还允许您编写 <b2>Windows 8</b2>游戏。.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> Preferences
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 首选项
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> also has a number of vector-based functions, listed below:
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 还有一些基于向量的函数，被列举在下方：

<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> contains a built-in programming language, commonly called <b1>GML</b1>, which gives you much more flexibility and control over your games than the standard Drag and Drop actions do.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 包含一个内置的编程语言，通常称为<b1>GML</b1>， 比拖放动作更灵活，更可控。
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> does not have a built-in sound editor.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 不内置声音编辑器。
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> doesn't actually render most things to the screen directly, but instead it renders them to the <b1>application surface</b1>.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 并不是将所有东西直接渲染到屏幕，而是相反地渲染到<b1>应用表面层</b1>。
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> has its own proprietary programming language called the <b1>GameMaker Language</b1> (abbreviated to <b2>GML</b2>).
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 专有的编程语言称为<b1>GameMaker Language</b1> （简称 <b2>GML</b2>）。
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> is an easy to use program for creating your own computer games.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 是一个易于用来创建你自己的电脑游戏的程序。
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> is not just limited to the resources that you create within the program as it has a special section on the resource tree of the main window for <b1>Included Files</b1>.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 并不只能局限于使用那些你在IDE中创建的资源，事实上在主界面的资源列表中有一项专门的分类叫做 <b1>Included Files</b1>。

<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> offers an intuitive and easy to use Drag-and-Drop (referred to as 'DnD' from now on) interface of action icons that allow you to start on creating your own games very quickly.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 提供了直观且易于拖放 (简称 'DnD' ) 的动作图标，使得您可以很快滴创建您自己的电脑游戏。
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> requires a reasonably modern PC running Windows XP, Vista, 7, or later.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 需要一个运行 Windows XP、Vista、7 或更高版本系统的电脑，
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> requires an internet connection to activate your licence before you can use it.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 在使用之前需要联网激活许可证。
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> will create a *.dish file which you will then need to prepare in the <b1>Application Oven</b1> app on a Mac.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 将创建 MAC 电脑上 <b1>Application Oven</b1> 所需的 *.dish 文件。

<i10><b11>NOTE:</b11> Due to the modular nature of</i10> GameMaker: Studio there are certain things that are not included in the manual, particularly those aspects of setting up and connecting the different devices that can be supported.
<i10><b11>注：:</b11> 由于</i10> GameMaker: Studio 的模块化性质，有些特定的内容并不包含在本手机中，特别是某些方面的设置以及支持设备的连接。
<i12><b13>Clear Project Asset Compile Cache</b13><br14>
<i12><b13>清除工程资源编译缓存</b13><br14>

<i13>You must only use VS 2012 (the Express versions are fine), so even if you have a previous version of Visual Studio, it will not work with this module.</i13> A version of this product that supports Windows Store JavaScript app creation is essential as you will need it to create the <t14>*.pfx</t14> file which is your <b15>Developer Key</b15> and needed to submit your apps and games to the Windows Store.<br16>
<i13>您必须只使用 VS 2012、2013 (或者 Express 版)，如果您使用旧版的VS，它不会与该模块一起工作。</i13>这个版本的VS支持创建 Windows 应用商店 JavaScript 软件所需要的 <t14>*.pfx</t14> 文件，并且需要 <b15>Developer Key(开发者秘钥)</b15> 一并提交到 Windows 应用商店。<br16>
<i15> Beneath the Download/Play button is the <b16>Subscribed</b16> button.
<i15> 下面的 Download/Play 按钮是 <b16>Subscribed (订阅)</b16> 按钮。

<i16><b17>Note:</b17> Due to licencing issues,</i16> GameMaker: Studio does not store the fonts with the project file (when the game is finally finished the font is rendered to a texture page, so finished games will draw the text as designed).
<i16><b17>注意 : </b17> 由于授权问题，</i16> GameMaker: Studio 并不会在工程文件夹中储存你的字体文件（当你游戏最终完成时字体会被渲染为一个纹理分页，因此最终游戏是以图片形式绘制这些文字）。

<i16>GameMaker: Studio</i16> stores images, sounds, scripts etc... between use in a cache so as to save time when testing your game as it will only re-compile those things that have been changed before testing.
<i16>GameMaker: Studio</i16> 储存 images、sounds、scripts 等... 使用缓存可以节约编译的时间使得只编译没有编译过得资源。
<i19> You may click this again to re-subscribe to the game, but bear in mind that this option is only available until you close the player.
<i19> 你可以再次点击重新订阅游戏，但是此选项仅在你关闭播放器之前才可以进行。

<i1> If you <i2>right-click</i2> on the data window, you can select how the data is displayed, setting the alignment and type, and you can also set how the data is laid out from the <i3>Columns</i3> box.
<i1>如果你<i2>右击</i2>数据窗口，你就能查看数据是如何表现的，设定队列和类型，你也能设定数据是如何在<i3>列</i3>盒子中陈列的。
<i1> Note that you can also create your own custom bindings if those that are presented by default do not match what you require by selecting the <i2>Custom Keys</i2> option.
<i1>需要注意的是，你还可以通过选择 Custom Keys (自定义热键) 选项为那些已经有默认快捷键的命令创建自己的 <i2>自定义热键</i2>。
<i1>Note!</i1> Not all IDE commands permit a keyboard shortcut.
<i1>注意!</i1> 并非所有的集成开发环境命令都允许设置键盘快捷键。

<i20><b21>NOTE:</b21> If you have bought</i20> GameMaker: Studio through <b22>Steam</b22>, the program should install automatically, giving you the option to create a start menu icon and a desktop icon.
<i20><b21>注意:</b21> 如果您是在 <b22>Steam</b22> 购买的 </i20>GameMaker: Studio，程序会自动安装，可以选择创建开始菜单及桌面快捷方式。
<i24>GameMaker: Studio</i24> has a complete editor for creating these areas and in the editor you can add and change many aspects of how the room will look and play.
<i24>GameMaker: Studio</i24> 有一个完善的编辑器创建这些区域，在编辑器里你可以添加或更改许多视觉或游戏性方面的东西。

<i29>GameMaker: Studio</i29> can load many different formats of graphic files - with JPG, BMP, PNG and GIF being the most common bitmap formats, although you can also import SWF vector sprites and JSON skeletal animation sprites (made with <b30>Spine</b30>).
<i29>GameMaker: Studio</i29> 可以加载多种格式的图片如 JPG、BMP、PNG 和 GIF。当然你还可以导入 SWF 矢量 sprites 和 JSON 格式的骨骼动画 sprites (用 <b30>Spine</b30> 创建的)。

<i2> 上面的图片输出了两个视野，每一个绘制在不同的位置。

“do”也就是“do... until”，缺一不可。

“repeat”语句的结构：

A 2D array needs to be initialised before use, the same as a 1D array, and can hold real numbers, strings and constants, just like any other variable, making them ideal candidates for any game that needs to store large amounts of data in an easily accessible way (remember, you can loop through an array easily).
二维数组在使用前同样也需要初始化，和其它的变量一样，也可以存储实数、字符串和常量。在需要便捷地储存大量数据时，二维数组是一个理想的选择（记住，数组中循环非常方便）。
A 32-bit system is not supported.
32 位 系统不支持。
A CPU that supports Intel VTx
支持 Intel VTx 的 CPU
A DirectX 9 (or later) compatible graphics card with at <i1>least</i1> 32MB of memory is required for most created games.
一个兼容 DirectX 9 (或更高版本) 、显存 <i1>至少</i1> 32MB的显卡。
A breakpoint is a place in your game code that you wish it to stop at so you can see what's going on.
断点是你游戏代码中你需要暂停的地方，这样你就能观察到底发生了什么。
A brief description of the data being stored.
所存储数据的简要说明。
A code block consists of a set of instructions, called statements, that are then interpreted by <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> and used to make something happen within your game.
一个代码段包含一系列指令，也可称作“语句”。这些指令在游戏运行时，由 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 解释并执行，以实现某种功能。
A conflict was encountered, but the gamer chose to ignore it
遇到冲突,但玩家选择忽略它。

A considerable number of useful sprites are bundled with <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> to help you get started and other collections of useful sprites can be found on the <i1>YoYo Games</i1> website which can all be used as "place holders" until you have enough confidence to make your own or get together with an artist, but please note that the bundled sprites are <i2>not for distribution</i2> in any finished works that you make.
很多有用的 sprites 包含在 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 帮助你开始制作游戏，也可以在 <i1>YoYo Games</i1> 网站找到，作为 "占位符" 使用，直到你有足够的信心制作精美的 sprites 去替代它们。但是这些 "占位符" <i2>不能够用于</i2> 成品。
A file selector dialogue pops up in which you can select the sound file, which can <i4>only</i4> be either a wave file or an MP3 file.
文件选择对话框将会弹出，你可以选择声音文件。<i4>只能</i4> 选择 wave 或者 MP3文件。
A font typically consist of 256 characters, numbered from 0 to 255, but in general you use only a small portion of these.
一个字体通常包含了256个字符，编号从0到255，不过通常情况下你只会用到其中的一小部分。
A form will then open in which you can change the properties of that resource (more on this in the following sections of the manual)
将会打开新资源的属性 (更多信息在接下来的部分查看)。
A global variable that is used to get access to the application surface index.
用于访问应用表面层索引的全局变量。
A local push notification is local to the device that the game is installed on, and requires no backend server.
本地通知由安装游戏的设备直接推送，并不需要后端服务器。
A percentage of 100 means nothing changes.
100%意味着没有任何变化。
A persistent object is one that does not go away when the room is changed, but rather it "persists" and is carried over into the new room.
一个持续性的物体不会随着房间的改变而被摧毁，

Be careful with using large backgrounds, especially if your target device is HTML5 or one of the smaller mobile devices, as large backgrounds need more memory and this could be a problem later when you try to compile your game.

Beneath the tabs, there is a section with hints, tips and offers related to <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0>, which you can scroll through using the arrow icons on either side, and beneath that you will see listed any projects that you have previously opened so that you can quickly get back to work where you left off previously.
在标签的下方，有部分有关 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0>,的提示、技巧，你可以通过两边的箭头滚动，再下方，则是列出之前打开过的工程使得你可以快速回到之前离开的工程。

Beside the quality bar for all file types, you can set the maximum volume for a sound, ie: if the slider is at 0.5 then the max volume for that sound when the gain is 1, will be half the recorded volume for the sound.

Breakpoints set from the IDE are saved along with your game and persist over various runs, however if you add a breakpoint to your code in the Debug Module, this will be lost after the module is closed, or a new test run started.

By changing this value you can change the amount of a room that you can see through the view, but bear in mind that this does <i0>not</i0> change the view <b1>port</b1> so setting a view height larger than the view port height will result in the view being scaled down to fit the port, just as a view height smaller than the port height will scale the view up to fit.
改变这个值，可以更改通过视野能看见的房间的范围，但是记住这 <i0>不会</i0> 改变 <b1>视口</b1>，所以设置了一个比视口高度更大的值将导致视野缩小以适应视口，而比视口更小时将放大以适应视口。h

By changing this value you can change the amount of a room that you can see through the view, but bear in mind that this does <i0>not</i0> change the view <b1>port</b1> so setting a view width larger than the view port width will result in the view being scaled down to fit the port, just as a view width smaller than the port width will scale the view up to fit.
改变这个值，可以更改通过视野能看见的房间的范围，但是记住这 <i0>不会</i0> 改变 <b1>视口</b1>，所以设置了一个比视口宽度更大的值将导致视野缩小以适应视口，而比视口更小时将放大以适应视口。

By default the application surface is enabled and all drawing for the Draw events will be done to that and the surface drawn to the screen.
默认是启用应用表面层，所有绘制事件中的绘制将会在应用表面层中结束，然后将这个表面层绘制到屏幕上。

By default this is enabled, but in many cases you will want to take over when and how the surface is drawn (when using shaders for example), in which case you would use this function to set it to false so that you can draw it yourself when and how you require.
默认是允许，但是也有许多需要接管何时及怎样进行表面绘制的情况 (比如使用着色器的时候)，这里你可以用这个函数设置为假，自主决定绘制的时间和方式。
By default, the GUI layer is 1:1 with the application surface resolution and drawn at the (0,0) position of the surface too.
默认情况下，GUI层与应用表面层分辨率比例是1:1，绘制位置也是在表面层的(0,0)。
By one level, we mean that only the last action performed will be undone.

GameMaker: Studio Overview
GameMaker: Studio 概述

GameMaker: Studio comes with a number of export options included when you buy it: Windows and Mac OS X (and Steam Workshop if you bought the program from Steam), as well as Windows 8 (Native) and Windows 8 (JS).
购买后，GameMaker: Studio 将出现许多导出选项：Windows 和 Mac OSX（如果是从 Steam 购买的程序还会包括 Steam 创意工坊的导出选项），以及Windows 8 (本地) 和 Windows 8 (JS)。
Games created with <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> take place in one or more <i2>rooms</i2>.
<i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> 创建的游戏发生在一个或多个 <i2>房间</i2> 里。

Generally the default settings of 16 bit, 44100kHz and 192kbps are perfectly adequate, but it may be that you wish sound effects (for example) to have a lower quality and music to have a higher quality, in which case these settings can be changed.<br2>
一般默认设置 16 bit, 44100kHz and 192kbps 即可，但如果你希望你的音效质量较低、音乐质量较高，也可以改变设置以达到目的。<br2>

Generally there are two types of functions - First of all, there is the huge collection of built-in functions which are used to control all aspects of your game, and, secondly, any <a0>scripts</a0> you define in your game can also be used as a function (but not always).<br1>
基本上有两类函数 - 首先是大量的内置函数，控制游戏的所有方面，其次是任何你在游戏中定义的<a0>脚本</a0>也可以当作函数使用（但不总是这样）。<br1>
Get the current vertical synchronisation method (Windows Only).
获取当前的垂直同步方法（只适用于windows）。
Get the position for default drawing of the application surface.
获取应用表面层默认绘制的位置
Gets the buffer method used on the Windows target platform.
获取 Windows 目标平台的缓冲区方法。
Gets the colour of the region inside the window/browser but outside the visible views (default is black).
获取窗口/浏览器内侧，但是可见视野外侧区域的颜色（默认黑色）。
Gets the current cursor being used in the game window.
获取游戏窗口内当前使用的指针。
Gets the current draw alpha value.
获取当前的绘制透明度值。
Gets the width of the window.
获取窗口的宽度。
Gets the x position of the window inside the browser/visible area of the screen.
获取浏览器或者屏幕显示区域的内部窗口的x坐标。
Gets the y position of the window inside the browser/visible area of the screen.
获取浏览器或者屏幕显示区域的内部窗口的y坐标。

如果用户点击了推送的通知，游戏会被启动并且 <a5>异步推送事件（Asynchronous Push Event）</a5> 会被触发，用户需要检查回调的字符串，根据这个值来处理和解决这个推送通知。

If used inside of a statement that forms a loop (<a0><t1>repeat</t1></a0>, <a2><t3>while</t3></a2>, <a4><t5>do... until</t5></a4> or <a6><t7>for</t7></a6>), it will immediately jump back to the beginning of the loop as if the loop had run through and looped back (if used outside of a loop it acts as an exit statement, exiting the event).
如果在循环语句中使用（<a0><t1>repeat</t1></a0>, <a2><t3>while</t3></a2>, <a4><t5>do... until</t5></a4> or <a6><t7>for</t7></a6>），它将立即跳到循环的起点（如果循环的外面使用，行为如同“exit”，退出事件）。

如果你<i0>右击</i0>窗口，你可以选择清空它，或者在剪贴板中复制它的内容。
If you <i4>right-click</i4> on a value you can set its type (see <b5>Data Types</b5>, below) to see details of data structures.
如果你在一个变量上<i4>右击</i4>，你能设定它的类型（见下文的<b5>数据类型</b5>）来观察它的数据结构细节。
If you are adding in <b1>code</b1> actions then these can also be named, as explained in the section on <a2>Scripts - Adding Comments and Naming Code Blocks</a2>.
同样在这里你也可以使用命名化的 <b1>代码</b1>动作，如果你不知道什么是命名化的代码，你可以参见<a2>脚本 - 添加注释和命名块</a2>。

If you bought <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> through <b1>Steam</b1> you can also purchase these modules easily on-line from the same service, with no licence being required as Steam keeps track of your details for you.
如果你是通过 <b1>Steam</b1> 购买的 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0>，你也能很容易的从相同的服务通道在线购买这些模块，并不需要许可证，因为 Steam 将处理这些细节。

tu.note: 有许专有名词不便翻译时，或许可以以括号的时形式注释。 如license check file(许可证检测文件)。

tuv.seg: If you cannot connect your computer to the internet for any long period of time, you can download the <b1>license check file</b1> from the YoYo Games website, and then point the auto update system to it.
如果很长的时间内你的电脑长期都不能联接网络，你可以从 YoYo 游戏网站下载 <b1>license check file</b1>，然后将自动更新系统指向它。
If you changed the current game project then you will be asked whether you want to save it before the program closes.
如果改变了当前游戏项目，则会询问是否保存。
If you choose not to tick <i14>any</i14> targets then that file will not be exported at all.
如果你没有选择<i14>任何</i14>目标平台，那么这个文件就根本不会被导出至游戏中。
If you click on it, you will be asked to supply a file, and then once that is done you should click on OK.
如果你点击它，会要求你提供一个文件。
If you click on the <b14>Delete</b14> button, the point selected will be removed from the path (there is an <i15>undo</i15> button at the top of the screen should you make a mistake).<br16>
如果你点击的是 <b14>Delete</b14> 按钮，你选中的那个点将被从路径中删除（如果你不小心删错了，你可以使用之前提到的 <i15>撤销</i15> 按钮）。<br16>

If you click on this button and then click OK, <i4>GameMaker: Studio</i4> will automatically parse your game code for strings and then create different character ranges to cover all the text in your game.
如果你点击这个按钮并确认，<i4>GameMaker: Studio</i4> 会自动解析你的游戏代码从中寻找字符串，然后创建相应的包含你游戏中全部文本的字符范围。

If you do a <i0>right click</i0> beside a line of code you can add a <b1>Breakpoint</b1> to the code (see below for more details on Breakpoints), and doing so again will remove it (you can also use the key <t2><f9></t2>, or the toggle option from the "Debug" drop down menu.
你可以<i0>右击</i0><b1></b1> 一行代码的旁边来添加断点（后文有更多关于断点的细节），再右击一次来取消（也可以用<t2><f9></t2>，或者“Debug”下拉菜单中的toggle option选项）。
If you do not have access to a Tizen device, you may be able to use the <b0>Tizen Emulator</b0>, however you must also meet the following requirements for it to work correctly:
如果你不能访问 Tizen 设备，你也可以使用 <b0>Tizen 模拟器</b0>，然而你必须满足以下需求以保证正常工作:

If you do not have an appropriate sprite yet, you can click the button <b2>New</b2> to create a new sprite resource and edit it as you wish, just as if you had created the resource through the standard creation options, only now when you click "Ok", it will automatically be assigned to the object that you had open when you started to create it.
如果没有合适的精灵，可以点击 <b2>New</b2> 按钮来新建精灵资源并且按照你的意愿编辑它，就像手动创建精灵一样，只不过按下 "OK" 按钮就会自动把这个精灵分配给物体。

If you do not use this function (the default setting) then the GUI layer will be positioned with its (0,0) point at the same position as that for the application surface (the area where your game is being drawn) and the width and height will be stretched to fit the this surface, such that setting a GUI width of 256px with this function when the application surface is 512px would stretch those 256 pixels to fit, effectively making the pixels twice as large.
如果你没有使用这个函数 (默认设置)， GUI层将被放置在同应用表面（游戏绘制的区域）一样的 (0,0)位置，宽度和高度将被拉伸以适合这个表面层，使用这个函数这样设置时宽度为256px的 GUI，当应用表面层是512px时，将会拉伸256像素为表面层的大小，使得像素放大两倍。
If you do nothing else at this point, when you run your game you will simply get a blank screen as all drawing is being done on the surface, but the surface itself is not being drawn anywhere.
如果不做到这一步，运行游戏时将会简单的获得一个空白的屏幕，因为所有的绘制都是在表面里完成的，但是表面层并不会在任何地方绘制出来。
If you do skip the tutorial, you can always go back and try it later through the <b17>Help</b17> menu at the top of the main screen.<br18>
如果您跳过了教程，可以随时从 <b17>帮助</b17> 菜单再次打开它。 <br18>
If you don't have a YoYo Games login, the email will also contain details of the new account that has been automatically setup using the email address you have provided.
如果你没有登录到 YoYo 游戏商店，这个邮件地址也会包含新帐户的详细内容，并且已经使用你提供的邮箱地址自动设定了新帐户。

If you don't want the GUI layer, then you can save the screen before rendering the GUI (ie: in the <b2>Draw</b2> event), but if you do want GUI elements to be included, then you save after the <b3>Draw GUI</b3> event.
如果你不想看到 GUI 层，你可以在渲染GUI（比如：在 <b2>绘制</b2> 事件中）之前保存，但是如果你真想看到GUI元素，那么在 <b3>Draw GUI</b3> 事件之后保存。

If you enable the window resize option in the Global Game Settings for the target platform, then the player can resize the game window to any size they wish, however by using this function you can limit the maximum height to the size you specify.
对于目标平台，如果你在全局游戏设定中允许窗口大小调整，那么玩家将可以调整窗口为任意想要的大小，尽管如此，通过这个函数，你可以限制调整的最大高度为指定值。

If you enable the window resize option in the Global Game Settings for the target platform, then the player can resize the game window to any size they wish, however by using this function you can limit the maximum width to the size you specify.
对于目标平台，如果你在全局游戏设定中允许窗口大小调整，那么玩家将可以调整窗口为任意想要的大小，尽管如此，通过这个函数，你可以限制调整的最大宽度为指定值。

If you enable the window resize option in the Global Game Settings for the target platform, then the player can resize the game window to any size they wish, however by using this function you can limit the minimum height to the size you specify.
对于目标平台，如果你在全局游戏设定中允许窗口大小调整，那么玩家将可以调整窗口为任意想要的大小，尽管如此，通过这个函数，你可以限制调整的最小高度为指定值。

If you enable the window resize option in the Global Game Settings for the target platform, then the player can resize the game window to any size they wish, however by using this function you can limit the minimum width to the size you specify.
对于目标平台，如果你在全局游戏设定中允许窗口大小调整，那么玩家将可以调整窗口为任意想要的大小，尽管如此，通过这个函数，你可以限制调整的最小p宽度为指定值。
If you fail to provide a valid license file, or there is no internet connection when requested, your copy of <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> will not work until such time as this is resolved.
如果你未能提供有效的授权文件，或者请求时没有联接到互联网，你的 <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> 副本将不能工作，直到解决这些问题。

If you fire off a series of <t1>cloud_</t1> requests then you need to know which one you are getting the reply to, and so you would use this value to compare to the value you stored when you originally sent the request to find the right one.
如果你发送了一系列的 <t1>cloud_</t1> 请求，你需要知道被回应的是哪一个，所以你要用这个值来和发送时存储的值进行比较来找到你需要的请求。
If you have "Uses Physics" selected then there will be another part visible in this window related to the physics options, but more on that later!<br0>
如果你使用 "Uses Physics" 选项卡，就会看到物理相关的选项，但是更多的会在后面讲到！<br0>
If you have a larger or smaller port size than that assigned to the view, the view will be scaled down or up to fit, as illustrated by the image below.
如果视口比分配的视野更大或更小，视野将被缩放以适应视口大小，如下图所示：
If you have a sprite strip image that you wish to load into <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> which does not have the above-mentioned format, this must be done from the <a1> Sprite Editor File Menu</a1>.
如果你想加载到 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 的图片不是上述格式，你需要打开 <a1>Sprite Editor File Menu (精灵编辑器文件菜单)</a1>。
If you have an iOS developer account then with the iOS module you can also publish to iPad, iPhone and iPod
如果你有一个iOS开发者账户和iOS模块也可以发布到ipad，iPhone和iPod
If you have bought <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> through <b1>Steam</b1> then you can also compile to the <b2>Steam Workshop</b2>.
•如果你在 <b1>Steam</b1> 上购买了 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 则可以编译到 <b2>Steam 创意工坊</b2>。
If you have bought <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3> through <b4>Steam</b4>, you will also have an additional target module to export your games to the <b5>Steam Workshop</b5>.
如果您在 <b4>Steam</b4> 上购买了 <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3>，您还将拥有一个额外的目标模块发布您的游戏到 <b5>Steam 创意工坊</b5>.

If you have bought <i7>GameMaker: Studio</i7> through <b8>Steam</b8>, then on startup you will be presented with an options screen (shown below) from which you can select to <b9>Play</b9> games from the <a10>Steam Workshop</a10>, or to <b11>Make</b11> games with the program.
如果你从 <b8>Steam</b8> 购买了 <i7>GameMaker: Studio</i7> ，在启动时可以看到一个选项 (见下图) ，可以选择从<a10>Steam Workshop</a10> <b9>Play (玩)</b9> 或者使用程序 <b11>Make (制作)</b11> 游戏。
If you have chosen <b0>compressed</b0> audio, you can then also choose to have your sound as <b1>streamed</b1> or <b2>not streamed</b2>.
如果 你选择了 <b0>compressed</b0> 音频，你可以选择用 <b1>streamed</b1> 的方式播放或者 <b2>不是 </b2>。

If you have chosen to build HTML5, then an index.html (default name, but you can give your own name too) along with a folder containing your game's files will be created and saved to the specified location.
•如果你选择生成 HTML5，那么会生成一个含有 index.html (默认名称，可更改) 的包含你的游戏的文件夹，并保存到指定位置。
If you have chosen to change the name of the file when you added it to the resource tree, then the file will now be stored with that new name.
如果你在添加文件时更改了文件的名字，那么这个文件将会用新的名称保存。
If you have different sizes, create two or more tile sets).
如果有不同的尺寸，创建两套或更多磁贴。
If you have initialised any buffers in your game, then this window will show you the buffer data.
如果你在游戏中初始化了缓冲器，这个窗口会给你显示缓冲数据。
If you have loaded an <t0>*.ogg</t0> file or an <t1>*.mp3</t1> file into the IDE, you will be presented with a "quality" slider.
如果你从 IDE 加载 <t0>*.ogg</t0> 或者 <t1>*.mp3</t1> 文件，你会看到 "品质" 滑块。
If you have no mask then you have no collision!
如果没有遮罩就没有碰撞！
If you have the setting as "Windows" in the main <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> window, then <b1>only</b1> a Windows compatible file will be made.
• 如果在 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 窗口 target 设置了 "Windows" ，那么就 <b1>只能</b1> 生成兼容 Windows 的文件。
If you have this window open, you can also <i3>double-click</i3> on an event in any instance from the resource tree and it's code will be shown in a new tab.
在该窗口打开的状态下，你也可以<i3>双击</i3>资源树中的任一实例中的事件来在新的子窗口中显示其中的代码。

If you have used previous <i0>GameMaker</i0> products and are thinking about upgrading to Studio then you can use this version to see the differences between it and previous versions, or if you have never used <i1>GameMaker</i1> before (or are new to programming) then this version is an excellent place to start.<br2>
如果你已经使用过以前的 <i0>GameMaker</i0> 产品，你可以升级到这个版本看看有什么差异，而没使用过 <i1>GameMaker</i1> 也没关系(或者从未接触过编程)，这个版本是一个好的开始。<br2>

If you have used the <t5>display_set_gui_maximise()</t5> function then the (0,0) position for the GUI layer will default to the top left corner of the game window, or display (when in fullscreen or on devices), with the scaling factor set by that function, and the width and height set by this one.
如果你已经使用 <t5>display_set_gui_maximise()</t5> 函数，然后GUI层的 (0,0)位置将默认为游戏窗口或显示器的左上角（全屏或者在移动设备上），用那个函数设置缩放因数，这个函数设置宽度和高度。
If you have views visible and then disable this option, the whole room will be drawn to the screen scaled to the window size.
视野可见时关闭这个选项，整个房间绘制到屏幕，画面缩放至窗口大小

If you master the DnD interface and how it works to control basic things in objects, you can then move on to the easy to learn programming language GML which gives you much more control over every aspect of <i7>GameMaker: Studio</i7>.<br8>
如果您掌握了 DnD 界面并且了解它是如何控制物体的基础事件，就可以学习简单的编程语言GML，使得您可以用 <i7>GameMaker: Studio</i7>控制您的游戏的各个方面。<br8>

If you only have one view active (and so only one view port) setting the x or y value of the port can have some interesting effects but is not normally practical (see the image below) and so it is better to maintain the x and y position as (0,0).<br7>
如果你仅有一个活动视野（因此只有一个视口），设置视口的x或y值，可以产生一些有趣的效果，但通常并不实用（看下面的图），所以最好保持x和y坐标为(0,0)。

If you plan on using the audio emitter functions to create 3D sound effects, you should indicate this here, otherwise choose mono or stereo depending on the use that the sounds are going to be put to.<br4>
如果你打算使用音频发射器功能来创建 3D 音效，你应该指明位置，否则在声音播放时将使用单声道或立体声。<br4>

If you select "Load Background", you will get the standard file selector where you can choose supported image file (PNG, GIF, BMP, JPG.) and also tell GM to make that image opaque (remove transparency), or make it transparent (this takes the colour from the bottom left hand corner pixel as the base colour to make transparent) or to smooth the edges of the background (only when it is transparent).
如果你选择 "Load Background (加载背景)"，会打开标准的文件选择器以选择支持的图像 (PNG、GIF、BMP、JPG)。在这里你还可以选择不透明 (去除任何透明部分)、去除背景色 (如果有使其透明)或者平滑边缘(如果它是透明的)。

If you select <b12>Play</b12> then <i13>GameMaker: Studio</i13> will close and the <a14>Steam Player</a14> will open, however if you choose <b15>Make</b15> then you will be presented with the standard <i16>GameMaker: Studio</i16> start-up screen.<br17>
如果你选择 <b12>Play</b12> <i13>GameMaker: Studio</i13> 会关闭， <a14>Steam Player</a14> 将会打开，但是如果选择了 <b15>Make</b15> 你将会看到标准的 <i16>GameMaker: Studio</i16> 启动界面。<br17>

If you select a point on your path (either by clicking on it in the editor or by clicking the point list on the left of the editor) and then click on <b13>Insert</b13>, a new point will be "inserted" into the path at the same position.
如果你选中路径上的一个路径点（不管你是直接点击这个点还是在路径点列表中选中的这个点），然后点击 <b13>Insert</b13> 按钮，那么一个新的点将被插入到你选中的那个点的同一位置上。
If you selected these you can press the button labelled <b2>Edit Sound</b2> to open the chosen editor and change the current sound.
如果设置妥当，你可以按下 <b2>Edit Sound</b2> 按钮打开外部编辑器。
If you switch it back on again, then the <i5>Global Game Settings</i5> will take effect again the next step.<br6>
如果你切换回来，<i5>全局游戏设定</i5>下一步会再次生效。<br6>

If you use the script action you can specify the script you want to execute, together with the up to five arguments, but if you are using the code editor to call a script, you can pass up to sixteen arguments.<br15>
如果你是用的脚本动作，你可以指定你要调用的脚本名称，以及最多5个参数。但是如果你在代码中调用脚本，那么你最多可以使用16个参数。<br15>

If you use this function to change the size of the game window, the contents of the window will be scaled to fit with a 1:1 ratio to the background canvas which will keep the image crisp and clear (although scaled if the window is other than the room or view size).
如果你使用这个函数改变游戏窗口口的大小，窗口内容将与背景画布以1：1的比例进行调整，以保持图像的清晰和明确（尽管缩放窗口不同于房间或视野）。

If you wish it to be <i13>only</i13> exported when you run the game in a browser, then you would only tick the "HTML5" box, and if you want it to be exported only to Android and iOS targets you would tick those, and so on.
如果你希望<i13>仅仅在</i13> 你用浏览器运行这个游戏时这个文件才会被解包出来，那么你应当只选择“HTML5”这一项；如果你只希望它在安卓或IOS平台上使用那么你应当只选择这两项；其它同理。
If you wish to go back to the default behaviour (ie: no mimimum), then use a value of -1.<br0>
如果想要回到默认的情况（比如没有最小值限制），只要使用值-1就可以。<br0>

If your copy of <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> has been bought through <b1>Steam</b1>, you will see that there is an additional target module for compiling to apart from the standard Windows and Mac OS X targets: <i2> When running your game through <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3> normally (or in debug mode), this target module functions exactly the same as the standard Windows compiler and will permit you to play and test your game in the Windows workspace.
如果你从 <b1>Steam</b1> 购买了 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 你将看到额外增加了 Steam Workshop 模块: <i2> 当你在 <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3> 里运行你的游戏 (或 debug mode (调试模式))，这个模块会像标准的 windows 模块一样编译它，并且在 Windows 环境运行和测试。

If your copy of <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> has been bought through <b1>Steam</b1>, you will see that when you start <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> you are presented with a splash screen containing two buttons - <b3>Play</b3> and <b4>Make</b4>.
如果你从 <b1>Steam</b1> 上购买了 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> ，当你运行 <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> 的时候你将会看见启动屏幕包含两个按钮 <b3>Play (玩)</b3> 和 <b4>Make (制作)</b4>。
If your display is 1024x768 and you set the scaling factor to scale by 0.5, then your GUI layer will be half the size of the display, effectively doubling the pixel size.
如果显示器是1024x768 ，设置缩放因数为 0.5，GUI层将是显示器大小的一半，有效的增加了一倍的像素（翻译修改建议 @断水）。

If your version of <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> has <i1>not</i1> been bought through <b2>Steam</b2>, you will need to run the program <t3>GMStudio-Installer.exe</t3> and follow the on-screen instructions to install.
如果您的 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 版本 <i1>不是</i1> 从 <b2>Steam</b2> 购买的，您需要运行 <t3>GMStudio-Installer.exe</t3> 程序并且根据屏幕上的提示安装。
Important
重要
Importing Resources
导入资源
In App Purchases
应用内购
In GML a function has the form of a function name, followed by the input arguments between brackets and separated by commas (if the function has no input arguments then just brackets are used).
GML函数结构是，一个函数名，后面是括号之内的输入的参数，参数用逗号分隔（如果没有参数，仅仅用括号就可以了）。

In a few minutes (depending on your internet speed) you should be able to access the file on your Steam account page where you can also modify all the details that you have included when uploading, including adding more screen shots, changing the visibility and editing the description (if you have the Steam client open, you can get to your files through the <i3>Community</i3> > <i4>Workshop</i4> > <i5>Your Workshop Files</i5>).<br6>
过几分钟 (取决于你的网速) 你可以在你的 Steam 账户页面访问该文件，还可以修改所有细节，包括可以添加更多的截图、改变可见性和编辑描述 (如果你打开了 Steam 客户端，你可以通过 <i3>Community (社区)</i3> > <i4>Workshop (创意工坊)</i4> > <i5>Your Workshop Files (你的创意工坊文件)</i5> 获取它们)。<br6>

In a game made with <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0>, the characters, monsters, balls, walls, etc... are all instances copied from a basic object template that is found in the resource tree and then placed in a room.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 制作的游戏中，角色、怪物、墙等都是一个个放置在房间中的物体的实例。
In a number of situations you want to let your instances complete an action depending on a particular value.
很多情况下，你想要实例根据一个特定值完成一个动作。

In a time line a moment is the same as a step, so ten moments on your time line are the same as ten steps in your game, and you can insert any number of actions and/or code into one moment and the object that has the time line assigned to it will carry out these actions at the required time.
在时间轴中，一个时刻等同于一步，因此时间轴里的10个时刻等同于游戏中的10步，并且你在任何一个时刻都可以执行任意多的动作，然后被绑定上这个时间轴的物体就会在特定的时间点里执行这些动作。
In a time line you specify which actions must happen at certain moments in game time, and you can use all the actions that are also available for an object in its different events.
在一个时间轴中你可以指定在某个游戏中的时间点执行某些特定的动作。你可以像在物体的事件中一样去调用各种动作。

大多数时候它们拥有一个精灵使得你可以在房间中看到它们。但有时它们也作为 "幕后" 操控者，控制玩家相关信息、分数或时间等等...
Mouse, Keyboard and Other Controls
鼠标、键盘和其它操作方式
Movement and Collisions
移动和碰撞
Much easier to keep track of one array than multiple variables.
一个数组更容易跟踪，胜过多个变量。
Nearly all iOS devices are compatible with <i6>GameMaker: Studio</i6> including:
几乎所有IOS设备都兼容 <i6>GameMaker: Studio</i6>，它们包括:

联网
New game data downloaded from the cloud (following a cloud_synchronise call)
从云端下载新的游戏数据(在 cloud_synchronise后调用)。

New users should definitely start at the beginning with the <b4>Using GameMaker: Studio</b4> section as it has all the information you need to get started as quickly as possible, however users of previous <i5>GameMaker</i5> versions can probably skip to the <b6>Advanced Use</b6> section to see what's new in this version.
新用户应该明确的从 <b4>使用 GameMaker: Studio</b4> 部分开始，它包括所有快速入门的知识，曾经使用过之前<i5>GameMaker</i5>版本 可以跳过这部分到 <b6>高级应用</b6> 部分，以查阅这个版本的新内容。

No matter what version of GameMaker: Studio you have, you will find that it comes bundled with a stand-alone application called the GameMaker: Player.
无论你拥有 GameMaker: Studio 的哪个版本，都会发现它捆绑了一个叫 GameMaker: Player 的独立应用。.
No new data since you last called cloud_synchronise
自从上次调用以来cloud_synchronise没有新的数据。
Normal surfaces are quite easy to use, but there are a few basic rules to be followed when you use them:
表面使用很简单，但在使用的时候，也有几个应遵循的基本规则：
Normalised Vectors
规范化向量

Normally most instances are visible but sometimes it is useful to have invisible ones - for example, you can use them for way-points to control a moving monster, or to keep track values and perform certain timed actions.
通常选择可见，但是有时不可见也是有用的。例如，可以使用点方式控制怪物移动，或者跟踪并进行一定的动作。
Normally these values are set in the <a0> Windows Tab</a0> of the <a1>Global game Settings</a1> but you can change them during the game.<br2>
通常是在 <a0> Windows Tab</a0>( 在<a1>Global game Settings</a1>中 ) 里面设置这个值，但是也可以在游戏中更改。<br2>
Normally you would simply use the <i0>Step In</i0> button to do this, but you also have one for stepping over code and one for stepping out of the code.
通常你只需要用<i0>跳入</i0>按钮来做这件事，不过你还有另外两个选择，一个跳过代码和一个跳出代码。
Normally you would try and keep them no larger than the size of the view or display window.
通常不要超过视野或者显示窗口的大小。
Not to mention the fact that all these people are highly experienced: programmers, art designers, sound technicians, etc.<br1>
更不用说，这些人都是经验丰富的程序员、设计师、音响师等。 <br1>
Note how in the code we have used the way that "switch" can check multiple cases and continue if no break is encountered to permit various keys to be used to get the same result.
注意代码中怎么用的，“switch”可以检测多个条件，如果没有“break”就会继续，以允许多个按键得到相同的结果。
Note how the "for" loop variable "i" is used to not only loop through the array, but to draw a number as well as tell <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> where to draw the values to in the room.
注意“for”是怎么使用“i”的，不仅仅是作为数组的下标，而且也会告诉<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0>房间内绘制的位置。
Note that all the property forms appear within the main window and you can have open and edit many of them at the same time.
可以同时打开多个资源的属性。

Note that although most modern browsers are capable of running HTML5 games, not all of them support the WebGL standard currently, so we recommend Chrome for testing as that shows all the features supported by the module.<br0>
注意尽管如今的浏览器均可以运行HTML5游戏，但是并不是所有的浏览器都支持 WebGL 标准。所以我们建议使用 Chrome 测试以便显示模块所支持的所有功能。
Note that for large buffers, scrolling down through the data will require that you scroll, then <i4>release</i4> the mouse button for the Debug Module to fetch and display the required data.
要主要注意对于大的缓冲器来说，需要你滚动页面才能看全数据，之后<i4>松开</i4>鼠标按键来选取然后显示调试模块中你所需要的数据。
Note that if the game is in the foreground when the time for the notification comes, it will <i0>not</i0> be shown, but the asynchronous event <b1>will still trigger</b1>.
需要注意的是，如果推送时程序运行在前台，通知将 <i0>不会</i0> 被展示，但是异步推送事件 <b1>仍会触发</b1>。

Note that if you are using the legacy audio system to play the sound (or are working on the HTML5 target), this slider is simply the <i5>initial</i5> volume of the sound and can be changed by setting the volume using the appropriate legacy function.<br6>
注意如果你打算使用传统声音系统播放音乐 (或工作于 HTML5 目标)，滑块是 <i5>初始</i5> 音量，可以通过适当的函数来改变。
Note that if you bought <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3> through <b4>Steam</b4> this option will not be present.
注意如果通过 <b4>Steam</b4> 购买了 <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3> 就不会出现该选项。

Note that if you have any Sony console license or the Xbox One licence as part of your GameMaker: Studio licence, then you will also see an option here to install the appropriate SDK and module resources.
注意如果你有 Sony 游戏机许可或者 Xbox One 许可作为你的 GameMaker: Studio 许可的一部分，这里也会看到安装的相应 SDK 和模块的资源选项。
Note that it looks for <i5>all</i5> strings (either within "" or '') and so may also include file names in the character ranges.
注意，这会查找工程中的<i5>全部</i5>字符串（无论有没有双引号），因此也会包含文件名中的字符。
Note that many of these commands can also be given by right-clicking on a resource (or a resource group), and then using the appropriate action from the pop-up menu.
需要注意的是很多命令也可以通过右键点击资源给出，然后从弹出的菜单中选择相应的命令。
Note that multiple case statements can be placed for the same statement.
注意，同一个语句前可以出现多个case。
Note that on the HTML5 target, this value is the height of the <i0>browser window</i0>, rather than the physical display size.
需要注意的是HTML5平台，这个值是 <i0>浏览器窗口</i0>的高度，而不是显示器的物理尺寸。
Note that on the HTML5 target, this value is the width of the <i0>browser window</i0>, rather than the physical display size.
需要注意的是HTML5平台，这个值返回的是 <i0>浏览器窗口</i0>的宽度，而不是显示器的物理尺寸。
Note that the above code has an <t0>instance_exists()</t0> call in the code block.
注意上述代码块调用了 <t0>instance_exists()</t0> 函数。
Note that the better the quality, the larger the file, and that increasing this on a low quality audio file will <i2>not</i2> improve the quality noticeably and only bloat the final game.
注意品质越高，文件越大，如果作用于本身就是低品质的音频文件，<i2>不会</i2> 提升品质，而只会使得游戏变得庞大。
Note that the time line can be started at any time in-game, so moment 0 is just the moment in which the time line starts and <i2>not</i2> the moment the game or room starts.<br3>
注意，时间轴可以在游戏中的任意时刻被启动，因此时间轴中的时刻0代表的是时间轴启动的那个时刻，而<i2>不是</i2>游戏或者房间开始的时刻。<br3>
Note that this can <i1>also</i1> be used for comparing variables in <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> and you may see this in examples and other peoples codes.
注意，你 <i1>也</i1> 可以用它 <i2>>在GameMaker: Studio</i2>中比较变量的大小，这个你可能会在例子里和其它人的代码中看到。

Note that this can also be set in the Global Game Settings and that it is <i1>only applicable Windows 7 and above</i1> - it will just use the default method if you have this option ticked and run on XP or Vista - and that it does <i2>not</i2> switch it on or off, for that you would use the function <a3><t4>display_reset()</t4></a3>.
注意，你也可以在全局游戏设定中设置并且<i1>只适用 Windows 7 或更高的系统</i1> - XP 或者 Vista 上，勾上这个选项也将使用默认的方法 - 并且它 <i2>不会</i2> 开启或关闭垂直同步，因为那个你将需要使用到函数 <a3><t4>display_reset()</t4></a3>。

Note that this does not report if v-sync is active or not (you can switch function <a2><t3>display_reset()</t3></a2>), and that you can set the v-sync method from the Global Game Settings or using the function <a4><t5>display_set_windows_alternate_sync()</t5></a4>.
注意这个函数并不是报告垂直同步是否激活（这个通过切换函数 <a2><t3>display_reset()</t3></a2>实现），你可以在全局游戏设定中或者或者使用函数 <a4><t5>display_set_windows_alternate_sync()</t5></a4>来设置垂直同步的方法。
Note that this may affect the games performance and that not all information is available in real time.
不过要注意这样也许会影响游戏表现，而且并不是所有的信息都会实时有效。

Note that this will neither crop nor stretch the contents of the surface, but rather it destroys the current surface and recreates it with the same handle (surface_id) with the new dimensions, meaning that it will need to be cleared and drawn to again (unless it is the <t2>application_surface</t2> in which case <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3> will do this automatically).
注意，这即不剪切也不会拉伸表面层的内容，而是销毁现在的表面，并使用同一个句柄（surface_id）、新的尺寸重建表面，意味着它需要清理并再次绘制（除非它是 <t2>application_surface</t2> ， <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3> 将自动处理）。
Note that while the rest of the audio properties are configuration specific, the audio group setting is <i3>not</i3> and a sound will belong to the same group on all configurations that you use.
注意，当其余的音频属性是特定的配置，音频组设置和它们的设置 <i3>不</i3> 一样，而是只使用音频组设置。
Note that you can select all targets or none of them simply by clicking the buttons in the properties window.<br16>
注意，你可以在属性窗口中点击相应按钮来全选、全不选目标平台。<br16>

Note that you cannot re-asign arrays or data structures in this way, but you <i4>can</i4> change some of their contents (you cannot change the "key" values in maps, nor the priority value for priority queues).
需要注意你不能以这种方式重分配数组或者数据结构，但你<i4>可以</i4>改变他们中的某些内容（不能改变地图数据结构中的“关键”值，也不能改变优先队列里的优先值） 。
Note that you cannot use the special <a0>keyword</a0> "<t1>all</t1>" with this method to target all instances, but you can use the keywords "<t2>other</t2>" and "<t3>self</t3>" without issues.
注意，这种方法你不能使用特定的<a0>关键词</a0> "<t1>all</t1>"， 但是其它的关键词 "<t2>other</t2>" 和 "<t3>self</t3>" 没有问题。

Note the difference here, as if you use <t0>exit</t0> in a script is will simply exit the script and return to the code that called the script, however if you use this event in a code block from within an object, it will exit <i1>the entire event</i1> even if there are various separate code blocks after the function has been called.
注意这儿的不同点，如果只是简单的在脚本中使用<t0>exit</t0>，它将跳出脚本并返回调用脚本的代码的位置，然后如果在物体的事件中使用，它将跳出 <i1>整个事件</i1>，即使后面还有独立的代码块。
Note the use of the word <i0>temporary</i0> here!
注意这个词 <i0>临时</i0> ！

Note too that a persistent object will still have its <b2>Game Start</b2>, <b3>Game End</b3>, <b4>Room Start</b4> and <b5>Room End</b5> events triggered, however if you restart the game (with, for example, the <t6>game_restart()</t6> function) all persistent objects will be removed and only exist when created again by the game.
需要注意的是持续性物体也有它自己的 <b2>Game Start</b2>、<b3>Game End</b3>、<b4>Room Start</b4> 和 <b5>Room End</b5> 事件触发器，但是当重启游戏 (例如使用 <t6>game_restart()</t6> 函数)，所有现存的物体将会被移除并且再次被创建一次。
Now let's expand our array to include different positions...
现在我们给数组扩展三个位置。
Now that we know what a normal array looks like, let's look at a 2D (two dimensional) array.
现在我们知道了普通的数组，再看看2D（二维）数组。

Now the instances you have placed will come to life because of the actions defined in their object create events and they will start reacting to each other due to actions placed in the object collision events.
现在你放置的实例拥有生命力了，因为你为它们的物体定义了创建事件所以它们开始彼此发生 碰撞事件等。
Now you can drag actions to the list as for object events.
然后你就可以向这个时刻中拖拽动作，就如同物体的事件一样。
Now you would expect the final array to hold the values 900, 800, 700, etc...
现在你期望最后的数组保存的值是900、 800、 700、等等……

Now, I say "based on" because you don't actually place objects directly into the game rooms, but rather you place <b2>instances</b2> of these objects which are basically copies (or clones if you prefer) of the object resource.
物体的 <b2>实例</b2> 和物体是两码事，实例是物体的拷贝 (喜欢的话也可以称为克隆)。

Now, making computer games is not normally a simple thing and the commercial games you buy nowadays typically take two or three years of development with teams of anywhere between 10 and 50 people and budgets that can easily reach millions of dollars.
现在, 制作电脑游戏并不是一件简单的事情，制作一个商业游戏您通常需要花费两年到三年的时间聘请10-50人去制作，很容易达到数百万美元。

Now, the default for <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> is that the game window (or background canvas) is the same size as the room, however when you activate views, this behaviour changes and the <i1>total size of the bounding box for all view ports</i1> is used.
现在默认，对于 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> ，游戏窗口（或者背景画布）和房间一样大，然而当你激活视野，这个行为会发生变化，并且使用得是<i1>所有视口的边界框的总和</i1> 。
Now, these Rooms are flat 2 dimensional spaces but they can contain 3D-looking graphics as well depending on how you use them.
现在，这些 Rooms 是二维空间，但是也可以包含三维图形，取决于您如何使用它。

Now, this can be done by simply creating an array of positions within the room and then having an instance move between them, but that can be a chore to set up and is difficult to change, test and adapt for different instance.
一般说来只需要简单的创建一个包含了房间中一些位置坐标的数组然后让你的实例在这些位置之间运动即可。但是创建这个数组是一件繁琐的操作，并且难以进行修改、测试和应用在不同实例上。
Now, this may sound complicated when written like that, but you should interpret it as:
听起来有点复杂，也可以这样解释：
Now, when you run your game in debug mode it will pause at the point (or points) that you have defined.
现在，当你在调试模块中运行游戏的时候，它就会暂停在你定下的断点（们）上了。
Now, you can try to achieve this by using the alarm events but when things get too complicated this won't work any more, especially as you are limited to only twelve alarms.
通常，你可以使用定时事件来完成这件事，但是当你的要完成的事情过于复杂的时候这根本行不通，特别是你只有12个定时器可以用。
Object whose instance must remain visible in the view.
保持在视野中可见的物体。
Objects and Instances
物体和实例
Objects are <i12>never</i12> created, rather they are used to create <b13>instances</b13>...
物体 <i12>永远不会</i12> 被创建，只是创建了它们的 <b13>实例</b13>...
Objects are a special resource that we use to control aspects of a game and to do specific things.
物体是一个用来控制游戏各方面的具体事件的特殊资源。
Objects are the fundamental "building blocks" within <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0>.
Objects 是 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 中的 "积木"。
Obsolete Display Functions
弃用显示器函数
Obsolete Functions
弃用函数
Obviously, you want to get started as quickly as possible, so <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> is bundled with a number of tutorials and demos which you can import and use to get straight to work.
显然，您想尽快地上手，所以 <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> 捆绑了一些教程和演示，您可以直接导入并且运行他们。
Of course, this assumes that the sprites, images, and sounds you used to make it can be distributed or sold as well and that you have the legal rights to all assets.
当然，前提是所有的游戏资源都是你自己制作的。
Often it is used to create a rotating minimap, or to "shake" the view for example.<br2>
经常用于创建旋转的迷你地图，或者视野震动效果。<br2>
Okay, we can use an array for those things mentioned above, but what is an array?
好的，上述情况可以使用数组，不过数组是什么呢？
On Android, <i0>all</i0> notifications received when the app is not running/in background, will be stored, and the data delivered by the async event the next time the app runs.
在 Android 平台， <i0>无论</i0> 程序是在运行状态还是后台状态，数据都将被存储下来，并通过异步事件的形式在程序下一次运行时被传送。
On Tizen, local notifications are <b0>not</b0> supported.
在 Tizen 平台, 本地通知是 <b0>不被支持的</b0>。
On iOS, data for a particular notification will only be delivered when the notification is selected (or if the app is running in foreground when the notification is received).
在 iOS 平台，一个特定的通知数据只有在通知被选择的时候数据才会传送（或者当收到通知时程序运行在前台时）。

On mobile devices, normally only one application can be active in the foreground at any time, but many games and applications operate in a time-based or interconnected environment where events of interest to users can occur when the application is <i0>not</i0> in the foreground.
在移动设备上,通常只有一个应用程序可以在任何时候活跃在前台,但是许多的游戏和应用程序需要基于时间或者其他特定的用户行为来触发事件， 并且<i0>不需要</i0>活跃在前台。
On starting <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> the following form is normally shown which presents you with a selection of options to choose from (unless you use the <b1>Steam Client</b1>, see below):<br2>
打开 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 的默认界面见下图 (除非你使用了 <b1>Steam 客户端</b1>，见下文): <br2>

On the left, you can see the different resources mentioned in other sections of the manual: Sprites, Sounds, Backgrounds, Paths, Scripts, Fonts, Time Lines, Objects, Global Game Settings and finally, Extensions.
在左边，你可以看到在用户手册其他部分所提到的不同的 resources (资源): Sprites (精灵)、Sounds (声音)、Backgrounds (背景)、Paths (路径)、Scripts (脚本)、Fonts (字体)、Time Lines (时间轴)、Objects (物体)、Global Game Settings (游戏全局设置) 和 Extensions (扩展)。
On the right you have a preview of the sprite image you select and some basic information about its size.
在右边有图片的预览和一些关于文件大小的信息。
Once an audio file has been assigned to a group you can then use the specific audio group functions to change them and lo load/unload them from memory.
一旦音频文件被分到了一组，你就可以使用特定的音频组函数改变它们或从内存中加载/卸载它们。
Once closed all unsubscribed games will be removed from the playlist and to re-subscribe you must search for them on the Workshop pages.<br20>
如果关闭了所有退订游戏并且关闭播放器，如果想重新订阅他们，则必须在 Workshop 页面重新找到它们。<br20>

Once everything is correct, you then go into the <b5>File</b5> menu and select the item <b6>Create Executable</b6> or you can press the following button, found on the main IDE toolbar beside the Play and Debug buttons:<br7>
一旦选择完毕，你可以点击 <b5>File</b5> 菜单并选择 <b6>Create Executable</b6> 按钮 (或者工具栏上相应的按钮):<br7>
Once finished you should then press the <b6>Create</b6> button to re-upload the game to the Workshop.
完成之后点击 <b6>Create</b6> 按钮重新上传到创意工坊。
Once installation is completed, in the Start menu you will find a new program group where you can start <i4>GameMaker: Studio</i4> as well as read the included help file.<br5>
一旦安装完成后，在开始菜单中你会找到一个新的程序组，你可以在这里找到运行 <i4>GameMaker: Studio</i4> 并且阅读帮助文件。<br5>

Once it has been added you can right-click on it and select "<b10>Properties</b10>" to edit the properties of the file: <i11> Here you can rename the file if you choose by changing the <b12>File Name</b12>.
当文件被添加到列表中后，你可以右击它选择 "<b10>Properties</b10>" 来编辑这个文件的属性：<i11> 在这里你可以修改 <b12>File Name</b12> 这一项来重命名文件。
Once that is done, you can assign this time line to the guard and the guard will do exactly what you planned.
完成后，你就可以把这个时间轴绑定在你的守卫上，然后这个守卫就会完全按照你计划中的那样行动了。
Once that is done, you should close GameMaker: Studio and restart it to enjoy the functionality of the new modules that you have purchased.<br9>
做完这一步后，重启 GameMaker: Studio，并享受你所购买的新模块的功能。<br9>
Once the sprite is loaded you are returned to the sprite properties window where the first subimage is shown on the right of the screen.
一旦加载好精灵，就会返回精灵的 properties (属性) 窗口，第一个子图像会显示在屏幕的右边。
Once there, all you have to do is fill in the required information (e-mail address and GameMaker: Studio base license), then select the target module or modules that you wish to add.
一旦到了那一步，你仅需要填写所需的信息 (邮箱地址和 GameMaker: Studio 基本许可证)，然后选择你希望添加的目标模块或模块。
Once they have been downloaded, this button turns into a "Play" button and clicking it again will start the game.
一旦下载完成，就会变成 "Play (运行)" 按钮，点击它就可以开始游戏。

Once this has been done, they will be visible in the Player (you may need to close and restart the Player for these changes to be visible) listed on the left hand side and selecting any one of them will show a screenshot, user information and also permit you to download them by clicking on the "Download" button.
如果这么做了。就会看见你订阅的游戏出现在播放器列表的左侧 (你可能需要重启播放器才能看到变化)，选择其中任何一个都会显示截图、用户信息，还有Download (下载) 按钮。
Once you are done you reset the drawing target so that all further drawing happens on the screen again.
一旦完成，重置绘制目标，再让进一步的绘制发生在屏幕上。

Once you become more familiar with <i6>GameMaker: Studio</i6> and want to use it to its fullest extent, it is advisable to start learning to use this language, as it greatly expands your possibilities when creating games.<br7>

一旦你熟悉了 GameMaker:Studio 的使用，并且你想要发挥它最大的能力，那么强烈建议你去学习使用GML，它可以极大的扩展你创造游戏时的可能性。Once you become more familiar with <i6>GameMaker: Studio</i6> and want to use it to its fullest extent, it is advisable to start learning to use this language, as it greatly expands your possibilities when creating games.<br7>
Once you click on "OK" the file will be stored with your current project in its own folder called <b18>data-files</b18> found in the project <t19>*.gmx</t19> directory.
一旦你点击了“OK”后文件就会被保存在你当前工程 <t19>*.gmx</t19> 文件夹下的一个叫做 <b18>data-files</b18> 的文件夹中。
Once you create a time line you can then assign it to an object, and the instance of that object will then execute the actions at the indicated moments of time when placed or created within a room.
当你创建了一个时间轴以后，你可以绑定在一个物体上，然后这个物体的实例就会在你指定的特定时间点上执行这些动作。
Once you have completed the design of your rooms, you are ready to run the game.
一旦完成了你的房间设计，你就可以运行游戏了。
Once you have completed the licence process, <i6>GameMaker: Studio</i6> will be ready to use!<br7>
一旦你已经完成了许可证的认证，就可以准备使用 <i6>GameMaker: Studio</i6> 了!<br7>
Once you have created a stand-alone application or package for your game you can then give the file to other people or place it on your website to download.
一旦你创建了独立应用程序或打包了你的游戏，你就可以把你的文件提供给别人或者发布到网站上供别人下载。
Once you have defined your objects it is time to define the <i22>rooms</i22> in which they will be placed.
一旦你定义了你的物体，你应该定义他们在<i22>房间</i22> 的位置。
Once you have done this, the necessary files will be generated so that you can distribute it as you wish.
点击确定后会生成目标程序，就可以如你所愿地发布了。
Once you have installed GameMaker: Studio and the gameMaker: Player, you can then run them independently and also upload your own games to the Player for others to play.<br0>
一旦你安装了 Studio 和 Player， 你可以单独运行他们，也可以上传你制作的游戏到 Player 平台给其他人玩。<br0>

Once you have installed your version of <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> you will be prompted to enter a License Key the first time you run the program (unless you have downloaded the <a1>free version</a1> or you have bought the program through <b2>Steam</b2> in which case this step can be skipped as your licence is tracked by Steam for you).<br3>
一旦你安装了你的版本的 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0>，第一次运行的时候你将会被提示输入许可证密钥 (除非你下载了 <a1>free version</a1> 或者你通过 <b2>Steam</b2> 购买了程序，这一步将会被跳过)。<br3>
Once you have loaded your file you can preview the sound by using the play button which will loop it continuously.
加载好文件后可以使用播放按钮预览音乐，这将循环播放音乐。
Once you have named the path, you can start to define it by placing points in the main window on the right.
当你给路径起好名字后，你就可以可以通过往右侧的窗口中放置点来定义这个路径了。
Once you have selected the file and the options, clicking the "Open" button will load the background into <i11>GameMaker: Studio</i11> ready to be used in your games.
选好了这些选项按下 Open 按钮把背景载入 <i11>GameMaker: Studio</i11>。
Once you have selected your data-type, the variable will then show the entries in the structure simply by clicking the small "+" next to its name.
选择好了你的数据类型以后，点击它名字旁边的小"+"来让变量显示整个的结构。

Once you have uploaded a game, to be able to play it you must first subscribe to it by clicking on the <b0>Subscribe</b0> button of the Steam Workshop page for your games, which can be found in the <b1>Community</b1> section of the Steam Client, on the right under the <b2>Actions</b2> menu.
一旦你已经上传了游戏，首先点击创意工坊里你的游戏的 <b0>Subscribe(订阅)</b0> 按钮就可以玩你的游戏了，它可以在 Steam 客户端的 <b1>社区</b1>部分右侧的 <b2>功能</b2> 菜单下找到。
Once you have uploaded your game to the Workshop, you may need to update it or wish to change the screenshot chosen for the description, etc...
一旦你上传了游戏到创意工坊，如果想升级它或是改变截图、描述等...
Once you select a resource there will be an additional <b3>Edit</b3> button here that you can use to change the sprite too.
一旦你已经选择了一个精灵就可以按下 <b3>Edit</b3> 按钮来编辑它，这样就可以更快地编辑该资源。
Once you start to work with it you will find out it is a very powerful tool indeed!<br7>
当你尝试过时间轴以后，你一定会发现它是一个多么有力的工具！<br7>
Once you've loaded or created your project in <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> the main GUI is shown and looks something like this:
一旦加载或创建项目，你将看到这样的 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 用户图形界面:
One final option that you have available to you is the ability to assign your font resource to a <b12>texture group</b12>.
最后，你可以给你的字体指定一个<b12>纹理分组</b12>。

One of the most common methods for accessing or changing a variable in another instance is to use its object name as an identifier and then use a point "." to tell <i3>GameMaker</i3> that the variable used after is to be assigned or changed in that object.
在另外一个实例中访问或者更改一个变量，最通常的一个方法是使用物体的名字作为标识符，然后使用一个点“.”告诉 <i3>GameMaker</i3> 之后使用的变量是在那个物体中指定或者改变。
One of the most powerful options within the object properties is the ability to assign a parent.
物体属性选项里最强大的功能就是父对了。

One thing that should be noted is that surfaces are <i5>stacked</i5> so you cannot jump from target to target and then reset to the normal draw target at the end, but rather you must open and close rendering targets.
还有需要注意的是，表面是 <i5>堆栈形式的</i5>，你不能从一个目标跳到另外一个，最后恢复默认的绘制目标，而是必须打开和关闭渲染目标。

One thing to note is that should you require drawing the whole display to a surface (including tiles, backgrounds etc...) you can simply access the application surface itself (see below for further details) or you could assign a surface to a view using the variable <a0><t1>view_surface_id[0..7]</t1></a0>as with this all that is visible in that view will be drawn to the corresponding surface.<br2>

脚本是由 GameMaker:Studio 所使用的一种内建编程语言GML（Game Maker Language的缩写，更多内容参见 Reference）编写的。Scripts are written using <b0>GML</b0> (the <b1>G</b1>ame <b2>M</b2>aker <b3>L</b3>anguage, covered in the <a4>Reference</a4> section), which is the built-in programming language that <i5>GameMaker: Studio</i5> uses.
Scripts can also return a value, so that they can be used in expressions.

Something to note about views and view ports is that the <i8>total area</i8> of the bounding box for all active view ports in the first room of the game is what defines the background canvas size (or window size for MacOS, Ubuntu (Linux) and Windows), as illustrated by the image below: <i9> Finally, you should take care when using multiple views as the draw event for <i10>all</i10> instances is called once for each view, so if you have three views active in one room, the draw event will be run three times every step (basically doing three times the work) which can be a cause for slowdown if the game is large or complex.

关于视野和视口需要注意的是，游戏第一个房间所有活动视口边框<i8>总面积</i8> ，便是定义背景画布大小的东西（或者MacOS、Ubuntu（Linux）和Windows的窗口大小），参考下图的说明： <i9> 最后，你应该注意多个视野的情况，因为对于 <i10>所有</i10>实例的绘制事件，每次视野都会调用一次，如果你一个房间有三个活动视野，绘制事件每步都会运行三次（基本上是三倍的运行量），如果游戏太而复杂，这会导致游戏运行速度减慢。

Stepping over is useful when you have large scripts to run through, as clicking this will run the whole script or code block as a single step and stop on the next line afterwards, while stepping out will take you out of a script (they will run, but all at once) and stop on the next step.
跳过代码在你有大片脚本需要运行的时候非常有用，点击它的话会把你的整片脚本或者代码块作为简单的一步来运行，停在随后的下一行；而跳出代码则会把你带出这段脚本（这些脚本一次性全部运行）然后停在下一步。

Strings and arrays do not permit this option, and it is worth noting that even if a data structure is stored in an instance variable, its ID number is <b3>global</b3>, so if you have four instances and each one creates a ds_list (for example), each list will have an id from 0 to 3, and they won't all be 0.<br4>
字符串和数组不允许该操作，即使数据结构存储在实例变量中也不值得如此，它的ID是<b3>全局的</b3>，所以例如如果你有四个实例，每个都生成一个ds_list（列表数据结构），它们的列表ID会是0到3，而不会都为0。<br4>

Surfaces
表面层

Surfaces are <i0>volatile</i0> meaning that they could be removed from memory at any time due to OS memory management and other things, so here we check to see if our surface exists and if it doesn't we create it and assign it to the view 0.
表面是 <i0>不稳定的</i0>，意味着系统内存的管理或其它原因，它们可能会从内存中销毁，所以这里检测表面是否存在，如不存在则创建它，并指定给一个视野。

Surfaces are always held in texture memory which means that they can be destroyed from one moment to the next (for example, when a screensaver starts on windows, or when minimised on an Android device), so you should always check that a surface exists before doing anything with it (this includes drawing it to the screen).
表面一直保存在显存里，这意味着从这一刻到另一刻（比如，电脑启动屏幕时，或者安卓设备最小化时），它可能会被破坏，所以在做与表面图层相关的操作之前，你一直都需要检测是否存在一个表面层（包括向屏幕绘制表面时）。
Surfaces take up space in memory and so need to be removed, normally at the end of a room, but it can be done at any time depending on the use you put them to.
表面图层会占据内存空间，通常需要在房间结束工作时清除它们，可以在任何时间执行这个过程，取决于你使用的方式。
