The ID of the surface to set as the drawing target.
作为绘制目标的表面层的ID。
The ID of the surface to use.
使用的表面ID。
The ID of the surface.
表面层的ID。

The Linux module is designed to be compatible with the Ubuntu operating system, and although it should work with other Linux systems, it is only guaranteed to work with the latest versions of this popular Linux OS.<br0>
Linux 模块用于创建 Ubuntu 操作系统程序，尽管它也可以运行在其他 Linux 系统中，但是建议运行在最新最流行的Ubuntu Linux 操作系统中。 <br0>
The Linux module permits you to make desktop games that run on the Ubuntu operating system
Linux 模块允许您制作Ubuntu操作系统的桌面游戏

The Locals window shows the current step properties, which includes the name of the current event (or script) being run, the position within the event (PC is "program counter"), the "self" instance running the code block, and the "other" instance in the event.
Locals窗口显示当前步下的性能与参数，包括了当前运行的事件（或者脚本）的名称、事件中的位置（PC就是“程序计数器”）、运行代码块的“self”实例和事件中的“other”实例。
The Main Menus
主菜单
The Marketplace Menu
市场菜单
The Mouse Event
鼠标事件
The Player Menu
播放器菜单
The Resource Tree
资源树
The Resources Menu
资源菜单
The Run Menu
运行菜单
The Scripts Menu
脚本菜单

The Tizen target module has certain pre-requisites that must be met before being used, the most important of these is that you must have installed the Tizen SDK (available You can get the SDK <a0>here</a0>).<br1>
Tizen 模块具有一定的先决条件，其中最重要的是必须安装Tizen SDK (点击 <a0>这里</a0> 获取 SDK)。<br1>
The Toolbar
工具栏
The Window Menu
窗口菜单
The Windows Phone module permits you to target those devices for your games (for Windows Surface devices, use the Windows 8 module)
Windows Phone 模块允许您发布您的游戏到WP设备上 (Windows Surface 设备需使用 Windows 8模块)
The Workspace
工作区
The YYC is really a number of separate modules, one for each available target, and will be made available to you when you get any supported target module.
虽然 YYC 被划分为单独的模块，但实际上是由一些分离的模块组成，每一个都将适用于一个可用的目标平台。

The YYC takes the normal <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> output and then compiles that into native code for the target platform, "stripping out" unneeded functions and performing a host of other optimisation techniques to create a smaller and performance enhanced executable.
YYC 使得普通的 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 输出并编译为目标平台的代码，“剥离” 不需要的函数，进行一系列技术优化，然后创建一个更小的、性能更强的执行程序。
The YoYo Compiler (YYC)
The YoYo Compiler (YYC) 模块
The above code check for a key press and the toggle the application surface on or off depending on its state (like in an options menu).
上述代码检测按键并根据它的状态切换应用表面的启用(就像菜单的选项)。
The above code checks a variable and if it resolves to true, then it exists the code block, otherwise it goes ahead and runs the rest of the code.<br0>
上述代码检测一个变量，如果为真它将退出代码块，否则继续运行后面的代码。<br0>
The above code checks for a key press and if it detects one it frees the memory reserved for the surface indexed in the variable "surf" and then changes room.
上述代码将检测一个键是否按下，如果检测到了，则对索引为变量surf的表面图层所预留的那部分内存进行释放，然后切换一个房间。
The above code checks for a mouse button press and then sets the window to fullscreen if it is not already, or sets it to windowed if it is already.
上述代码将检测鼠标按下，如果还不是全屏则设置窗口为全屏，否则在已经是全屏模式时设置为窗口。
The above code checks the orientation of the device and sets a global variable depending on the value returned.
上述代码检测设备的取向，根据返回值设置一个全局变量。
The above code checks to make sure that the correct asynchronous function call is being revised, then goes on to get the status of the returned cloud ds_map.
上面的代码通过检查以确保异步调用的函数正确性，然后返回云端 ds_map 的 status。
The above code checks to see if a surface exists and if it does not it will create a surface that is 1024 pixels wide and 1024 pixels high, assigning the index to the variable "surf".
上述代码将检测是否存在一个表面图层，如果没有则创建一个1024×1024px大小的表面图层，并指定给索引为变量“surf”。
The above code checks to see if an instance of the object "obj_Player" exists and if it does, it sets view[0] to follow that instance.
上述代码将检测如果物体 “obj_Player”存在一个实例，它将设置 view[0] 跟随那个实例。
The above code checks to see if view[0] is visible or not and if it is not, it then sets it to be visible.
上述代码检测 view[0] 是否可见，如果不可见，则设置为可见。
The above code checks to see if views are enabled for the room, and if they are not, it makes sure that view[0] is visible and then enables views for the room.
上述代码将检测房间视野是否开启，如果没有则让视野可见并启用视野。
The above code checks to see which view is currently being drawn and then draws a different text to each view based on the return value.
上述代码将基于返回值检测当前绘制的是哪个视野并绘制不同的文字。
The above code creates a <t0>ds_map</t0> and then requests data for the first available notification in the queue.
上面的代码创建了一个 <t0>ds_map</t0> ，然后请求数据队列中第一个可用的通知。
The above code creates a new ds_grid, based on the width and height of a previously created grid, then copies the information form the previous grid to the new one.
上述代码创建了一个新的栅格结构，基于先前创建的栅格的宽度和高度，然后从先前的栅格中拷贝信息给新的栅格。
The above code creates a string from the values stored in the global array "Highscores" and then writes this string to a file for local storage.
以上的代码创建了一个字符串的值存储在全局数组“Highscores”中,然后将该字符串写入本地存储。

The above code creates a string from the values stored in the global array "Highscores" and then writes this string to the cloud service for storage, as well as writing it to a file for local storage.
以上的代码创建了一个字符串的值存储在全局数组“Highscores”中,然后将该字符串写入存储的云服务中,并且在本地文件中保存了一份。

The above code creates two surfaces of different sizes, assigning each one to a different canvas element, and then those surfaces are assigned to two views so that the correct part of the room is captured.
上述代码创建了两个不同大小的表面，并给他们每个都指定了不同的画布元素，然后为了在房间里捕捉正确的部分，给这两个表面层指定了两个视野。
The above code first checks the current draw alpha and then if it is not set to 1 it sets it to 1.
上述代码首先检测当前绘制透明度，当其不为1时，将其设为1。
The above code gets the hue used to make the colour constant "c_teal" and then merges it with white at a 50:50 ratio, storing the resulting colour in the variable "col".
上述代码获取常量 "c_teal"的色相，然后将其与白色按照50：50的比例混合，并且将混合后的新颜色储存到变量 "col"中。

The above code gets the saturation used to make the colour constant "c_teal" and then uses that value to set a random colour to have the same saturation, storing the resulting colour in the variable "col".
上述代码获取常量 "c_teal"的饱和度，然后使用这个饱和度与一个随机的颜色相搭配，并且将得到新颜色储存到变量 "col"中。

The above code gets the value used to make the colour constant "c_teal" and then uses that value to set a random colour to have the same luminosity, storing the resulting colour in the variable "col".
上述代码获取常量 "c_teal"的明度，然后使用这个明度与一个随机的颜色相搭配，并且将得到新颜色储存到变量 "col"中。
The above code initialises a for loop, starting at 0 and counting up until 9, and then uses the loop value of "i" to draw the values stored in an array down the screen.
上述代码初始化“i”用于循环，始于0累计至9，使用循环值“i”在屏幕上绘制数组的值。
The above code resets the position of view port[0] to the (0,0) position (top left hand corner) of the display.
上述代码将重设view port[0]（视口）的位置为 显示器的(0,0)位置 (左上角)。
The above code sets the speed of the view following to be the same as the currently selected follow object.
上述代码设置视野的移动速度与跟随的物体的速度一致。
The above code sets the width and height of the view to be the same as the width and height of the view port.
上述代码将设置视野的宽高与视口的一致。
The above code stores the current x axis window position in the variable "wx".
上述代码储存当前窗口位置的x坐标至变量wx。
The above code stores the current x axis window position of the mouse in the variable "wx".
上述代码储存当前窗口内的鼠标x轴坐标至变量“wx”。
The above code stores the current y axis window position in the variable "wy".
上述代码储存当前窗口位置的y坐标至变量wy。
The above code stores the current y axis window position of the mouse in the variable "wy".
上述代码储存当前窗口内的鼠标y轴坐标至变量“wy”。
The above code takes a screenshot of a part of the game screen that is 100 pixels square when the user presses the "S" key.
上述代码在按下“S”键时将游戏屏幕边长100像素的正方形区域保存为截图。
The above code takes a screenshot of the game when the user presses the "S" key.
上述代码在按下“S”键时保存游戏屏幕截图。
The above code uses "switch" to check for a keyboard event and then compares that to the cases listed.
上述代码使用“switch”检测键盘事件，然后和条件列表比较。
The above code will add up all the values in our array, draw each of them and draw the total value at the end.
这段程序将数组中的数据依次累加，并绘制数组的值每个值，最后绘制累加的总和。
The above code will center the game window within the display if it is not in full screen mode.
在不是全屏模式下的情况下，让游戏窗口屏幕居中放置。
The above code will change the size of the window based on the value of the variable "global.scale" when the mouse button is pressed.
上述代码将在鼠标按下时，基于变量“global.scale”改变窗口的大小。
The above code will change the window cursor to the standard windows drag cursor if the left mouse button has been pressed and it has not already been changed previously.
如果之前不是拖放指针，上述代码将在按下鼠标左键时切换窗口鼠标指针为拖放指针。
The above code will change the window cursor to the standard windows drag cursor if the left mouse button has been pressed.
上述代码在鼠标左键按下时改变窗口光标为拖动光标。
The above code will check for a mouse button being pressed, and if it is it then gets the mouse position relative to the view[0] and compares it to see if a variable should be set to true.
上述代码将检测鼠标是否按下，如果是，然后它会获取相对于视野0（view[0]）的鼠标位置，并且比较它的值，看是否应该设置为真。
The above code will check the current geometry method and set it to "fast" if it is not already.
上述代码将检测当前的几何顶点缓冲区的方法，如果没有准备好则设置为 “fast（vbm_fast 方法）”。
The above code will check the current view being drawn and if it is view[0] it copies the surface indexed in the variable "temp_surf" onto the surface indexed in the variable "surf".
上述代码将检测当前绘制的视野，如果视野是 view[0]，则复制变量为 "temp_surf" 的表面到变量为 "surf"的表面。
The above code will check the view port size against that of the surface "aplication_surface" and if it is different, the surface is re-sized.
上述代码将检测视野输出大小是否与“应用表面”的一致，如果不同，将重置表面层的大小。
The above code will check the window colour to see if it is set as black or not, and if it is not it sets it to black.
上述代码检测窗口内背景颜色，如果不是黑色则设置为黑色。
The above code will check the windows caption to see if it has text or not, and if it does it sets it to an empty string so as no caption is displayed.
上述代码检测窗口是否有标题文字，如果有则设置为空，即不显示标题。
The above code will check to see if a surface indexed in the variable "surf" exists, and if it does not, it will re-create it.
上面的例子中将检测变量为 "surf"的表面图层是否存在，如果不存在，将重新创建一个。
The above code will check to see if the game window is in focus or not, and if the function returns <t0>false</t0> a script will be called.
上述代码将检测游戏窗口是否是焦点，如果返回 <t0>false</t0>，则调用一个脚本。
The above code will check to see if the user presses the "S" key on the keyboard and if they do it will save a part of the surface indexed in the variable "surf" to disc.
上面的代码将检查是否用户按下键盘上的“S”键，如果他们这样操作了，将对变量“surf”索引的表面层的一部分进行存盘保存。
The above code will check to see if the user presses the "S" key on the keyboard and if they do it will save the surface indexed in the variable "surf" to disc.
上面的代码将检查是否用户按下键盘上的“S”键，如果他们这样操作了，将对变量“surf”索引的表面层存盘保存。
The above code will check to see if the v-sync method is using the alternative or the default, and if it's the default it will switch to the alternative instead.
上述代码检测是否使用于替代的垂直同步方法，如果是默认的则切换为替代的方法。
The above code will check to see if the window is in full screen mode or not and draw a text message depending on the returned value.
上述代码将检测是否为窗口模式，根据返回的值绘制文字。

The above code will check to see which view is currently being drawn, and if it is view[0] it sets the draw target to a surface and draws all instances of the object "obj_Effect" before resetting the draw target again.
上述代码将检测当前是哪个视野在绘制，如果是view[0] ，它将设置绘制目标到一个表面层，并在表面层上绘制“obj_Effect”所有实例 ，然后重置绘制目标。
The above code will draw a 4 vertex triangle fan textured with the texture held in the "tex" variable, which is itself taken from a previously created surface.
上述代码将绘制四个顶点的三角形面，纹理采集自之前创建好的表面。
The above code will draw the score at a position relative to the x and y coordinates of view[0].
上述代码将在相对于视野0（ view[0]）的x、y坐标的一个位置绘制分数。

The above code will generate a 1D array held in the variable <t0>display_data</t0> containing the information about the displays, as well as create the variable <t1>display_num</t1> to hold the number of active displays found.
上述代码将生成一个包含显示器信息的一维数组保存到变量 <t0>display_data</t0>，同时创建变量 <t1>display_num</t1> 保存找到的激活的显示器的数目。
The above code will get the 32bit colour value at the position of the mouse and then split it into its component values, storing them in variables.
上述代码将获取鼠标位置的32位真颜色，提取它的分量值，储存到不同的变量上。

The above code will get the angle of direction from the instance to the mouse cursor, then get the difference between that angle and the current <t0>image_angle</t0>, using this value to slowly rotate towards the mouse.
上述代码将会获得实例到鼠标光标的方向角，然后获得这个角度与当前的<t0>image_angle</t0>的差值，同时使用这个值缓慢地向鼠标方向旋转。
The above code will get the blue component of the colour constant "c_teal" and store the value in the variable "b_comp".
上述代码获取常量 "c_teal"的蓝色值，并且将其储存到变量 "b_comp"中。
The above code will get the green component of the colour constant "c_teal" and store the value in the variable "g_comp".
上述代码获取常量 "c_teal"的蓝色值，并且将其储存到变量 "g_comp"中。
The above code will get the position of the application surface, as well as the absolute width and height in relation to the display window, and store them in four variables for future use.
上述代码获取应用表面层的位置，以及相对于显示器或窗口的绝对长宽值，保存到四个变量上备用。
The above code will get the red component of the colour constant "c_teal" and store the value in the variable "r_comp".
上述代码获取常量 "c_teal"的红色值，并且将其储存到变量 "r_comp"中。
The above code will lock the draw GUI event to the given width and height, scaling all components to fit either the application surface, or the display, using that proportion.
上述代码将锁定GUI绘制事件，以指定的宽度和高度，使用那个比例缩放所有的分量以适应应用表面或者显示器。
The above code will lock the draw GUI event to the given width and height, scaling all components to fit the display, using that proportion.
上述代码将锁定GUI绘制事件，以指定的宽度，使用那个比例缩放所有的分量以适应显示器。
The above code will position the game window in the upper left corner of the browser or display (depending on the target module being used).
上述代码将放置游戏窗口至浏览器或者显示器（根据正在使用的目标模块）的左上角。
The above code will resize the application surface to have a 1:1 ratio with the GUI layer.
上述代码在GUI层上以1:1的比例重置应用表面层的大小。
The above code will resize the ds_grid indexed in the global variable "Grid" and then clear it so that each cell holds the value -1.
上述代码将会重设索引为全局变量"Grid"的栅格结构的大小，并且接下来清空它以便每个单元个都承载值-1.
The above code will scale the view width and height based on the ratio of the view port width and height.
上述代码将基于视口宽高比，缩放视野宽高。
The above code will set an advert to display at the bottom left-hand corner of the display.
上述代码在显示器底部左下角设置并显示一个广告。
The above code will set an advert to display at the top right-hand of the display.
上述代码将在显示器右上角设置并显示一个广告。
The above code will set the anti-aliasing level to 8 if supported and switch v-sync to on.
上述代码将设置抗锯齿等级为8，并开启垂直同步。
The above code will set the game window to occupy the whole display area (either the browser or the screen, depending on the target platform).
上述代码将设置游戏窗口覆盖整个显示器区域（可以是浏览器或者屏幕，取决于目标平台）。
The above code will set the minimum and maximum width and height for the game window.
上述代码将为游戏窗口设定最大宽高。
The above code will set the render target 0 to the surface ID indexed in the variable "surf".
上述代码将渲染目标0到变量“surf”索引的表面层上。
The above code will set the view follow borders to half the width and height of the view, effectively forcing the view to always be centered on the follow object.
上述代码将设置视野跟随边界为视野宽度和高度的一半，有效的迫使跟随的物体保持在视野的中心。
The above code will skip back to the beginning of the loop if the array[i] value is already an empty string.
上述代码将判断array[i]的值，如果是一个空字符，它将跳回到循环的开始。
The above code will store the current window height in the variable "hh".
上述代码将获取当前窗口的高度，保存到变量"hh"中。
The above code will store the current window width in the variable "ww".
上述代码将保存当前窗口的宽度到变量“ww”中。
The above code will store the d3d device pointer in a variable.
上述代码在一个变量中保存d3d设备的指针。
The above code will store the game window id in a variable.
上述代码将在变量中保存游戏窗口的id。
The above code will store the height of the surface indexed in the variable "surf" in the variable "sh".
上述代码将在变量sh中储存索引变量为surf的表面图层的高度。
The above code will store the width of the surface indexed in the variable "surf" in the variable "sw".
上述代码将在变量sw中储存索引变量为surf的表面图层的宽度。
The above code will switch off the automatic drawing of the application surface.
上述代码将切换应用表面层的自动绘制为假。
The above code would center the mouse in the game display.
上述代码将鼠标放置在显示器中央。
The above code would center the mouse in the game window.
上述代码将鼠标在游戏窗口中居中放置。

The above modules are included as standard for all versions of <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> but the following modules are available only to those who have upgraded from the <b1>Free</b1> or <b2>Standard</b2> version of <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3> to the <b4>Professional</b4> version (more information on the different versions of <i5>GameMaker: Studio</i5> can be found <a6>here</a6>).
以上模块包含在标准版 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 里，但是下面的模块只提供给那些已经从 <b1>免费版</b1> 或 <b2>标准版</b2> 升级到 <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3> <b4>专业版</b4> 的用户 (更多不同版本的 <i5>GameMaker: Studio</i5> 信息请点击 <a6>这里</a6>)。
The above program tries to place the current object at a free position (this is about the same as the action to <a0>move an object to a random position</a0>).
上述代码尝试去在一个空闲位置放置当前的实例（这和动作 <a0>移动物体至随机位置</a0>结果相似）。
The above rules for file types are for the default configuration of <b0>Uncompressed</b0> audio.
上述文件类型是 <b0>Uncompressed (未压缩)</b0> 音频的默认配置。

产生的实际文件取决于 <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> GUI 界面选择的模块。
The actual game you create happens in a window, and this window has a number of properties, like whether it has a border, whether it is full screen, etc.
你创建的游戏实际上是在窗口中运行，而窗口有许多属性，比如是否有边框，是否全屏等。
The actual sequence of events is as follows:
实际的事件序列如下所示：

程序的结构可以千差万别，但最基本的通常都像下面这样：
The available anti-aliasing levels are 0,2,4 and 8, with the default startup value being set to 0, and the default v-sync setting is false (off).
可用的抗锯齿等级包括0、2、4和8，默认起动时设置为0，默认的 v-sync（垂直同步）设置为关闭 (假)。

现有的目标模块:

The basic idea is rather simple - you define a path by drawing it in the path editor, then you can place an action (or code) in the creation event of an object to tell the object to follow that particular path.
路径的基本理念非常简单——通过在路径编辑器中绘制一条路径，你就可以在一个物体的创建事件中添加一个动作（或者用代码）来让这个物体沿着某个特定路劲运动。
The basic use of a surface would be as follows - You first create a surface and assign its index to a variable.
表面层的基本用法如下 - 首先创建一个表面，给它的索引分配给一个变量。

The connection kind can be either <i20>straight line</i20>, or <i21>smooth</i21> where a straight line connect simply connects the points of a path in a linear basis, with angular changes at each point, while a smooth connection will create a much softer path that may not pass directly through any of the points, but rather take an approximate line, creating nice curves.
连接方式可以是<i20>线段</i20>或者是<i21>平滑</i21>。如果设置为线段方式，那么路径只是简单的用直线依次连接每一个点，路径的方向只在每个连接点处才会改变；而如果使用平滑方式，那么系统会根据你的点创建一条更加平滑的曲线路径。

纵向放置设备 如：从顶部到底拥有最长的边缘，菜单在底部。
The different target compilers will perform the operations in different orders since they are not explicitly shown, giving rise to "odd" results that you may not expect when you play your game.
不同平台的编译器用不同的顺序执行运算，如果没有明确体现，可能会导致得出一个奇怪的结果，而影响游戏的体验。
The draw alpha affects the transparency of all draw functions, and can be set with the <a0><t1>draw_set_alpha</t1></a0> function.
这个绘制透明度会影响所有的绘制函数，你可以使用 <a0><t1>draw_set_alpha</t1></a0> 函数来修改它。

然后绘制目标设置给这个新的表面图层，接下来是清除表面，设置为透明，再是将绘制目标设置给显示器。

The file is then sent to the cloud service for storage.
该文件之后被提交到云端服务器中存储。

The file should contain <i1>all</i1> the information that you need to save for your game as you can only store one single "data blob" to the cloud, and running this function again will over-write any previously stored values (as will using the <a2><t3>cloud_string_save</t3></a2> function).
该文件应该包含你所需要保存的游戏的 <i1>全部</i1> 信息，你只能上传一个二进制数据（ "data blob" ）到服务器上, 并且再次运行这个函数将覆盖之前存储的值 (如同使用 <a2><t3>cloud_string_save</t3></a2> 一样).
The file to be uploaded (as a string).
将被上传的文件(同i符串)。

The file will be saved to the working directory of the game, which in windows is located at <i0>"C:\Users\YOURUSERNAME\AppData\Local\YOURGAMENAME\"</i0> This is an image of the whole <i1>display region</i1> and not just a specific section or view and your are saving out what is being drawn to the back buffer at the time, meaning that depending on where you call the function the results will differ.
文件将被保存到游戏的工作目录，windows系统是在 <i0>"C:\Users\YOURUSERNAME\AppData\Local\YOURGAMENAME\"</i0>，保存的是整个 <i1>显示区域</i1>的图片，而不仅仅是一个特定的部分或者视野，并且保存的是绘制到背景缓冲区那时间的绘制的内容，这意味着根据调用这个函数的位置绘制的内容会有所区别。

The function returns a unique <b0>id</b0> value which would then be used in the <a1> Asynchronous Cloud Event</a1> to retrieve the relevant information from the ds_map that is created.<br2>
这个函数将返回一个唯一 <b0>id</b0> ，这个值被用于 <a1> 异步云事件（Asynchronous Cloud Event）</a1> 中从已创建的 ds_map 来检索关联信息。<br2>
The function will only work while the game is in focus and using alt + tab will unlock the mouse.
这个函数只有焦点在游戏中时有用，所以使用 alt + tab时 将会解锁鼠标。
The function will return a unique <b0>id</b0> value that should then be used in the appropriate asynchronous event to identify the ds_map that is returned as a "call back" from the cloud service.
该函数将返回惟一的<b0>id</b0> 值，那么应该使用适当的异步事件识别 ds_map 返回作为云服务的“回调（call back）”。

The function will return an array with 8 values per display (ie: if you have two displays, the array will have a length of 16 indices), where the values [0 ... 3] correspond to the overlapx1, overlapy1, overlapx2, overlapy2 - defining the region of overlap on this display and will be set to 0,0,0,0 if no overlap - and the values [4 ... 7] corresponds to the monitorx1, monitory1, monitorx2, monitory2 - the coordinates of the display in the virtual display space.

对于每个显示器，这个函数将返回8个值添加到一个数组中（比如你有两个显示器，数组长度将是16），值[0~3] 对应 overlapx1、 overlapy1、 overlapx2、 overlapy - 定义显示器里的重叠区域，如果无重叠，将设置为 0,0,0,0 - 值 [4~ 7] 对应 monitorx1、 monitory1、 monitorx2、 monitory2 - 它们是虚拟显示器空间上的坐标。

The function will return an array with four keys, where key 0 and 1 are the x and y position of the top lefthand corner of the surface, and keys 2 and 3 are the x and y of the bottom righthand corner of the surface, all relative to the size of the display or window.<br4>
这个函数将返回包含四个键值的数组，键0和键1是表面左上角x/y的位置，键2和键3是表面右下x/y的位置，所有的这些值响应显示器及窗口发生变化。<br4>
The function will return the index of the surface which should be stored in a variable for future function calls.
这个函数将返回表面的索引名称，并储存在一个变量上，方便将来函数调用。
The fundamental thing that makes a game a <i0>game</i0> is the interaction with the player.
制作一个 <i0>游戏</i0>最根本的事件是与玩家交互。
The games you upload can be works in progress or finished games, but they cannot be for sale as the nature of the Workshop is to offer user created content for free.
你可以上传正在制作或已经完成的游戏，但是他们并不能在创意工坊中售卖，只能免费提供给玩家。

The general definition of a function is something like this: <i0>A function has an input and an output, and the output is related somehow to the input.</i0> In <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> you use functions as part of the <a2>program</a2> to make things happen in your game and there are a great number of GML (GameMaker Language) functions available to you, all of which are explained in the <a3>Reference</a3> section of the manual.<br4>
函数的基本定义是这样的：<i0>函数有输入（自变量）和输出（因变量），输出用某种方式对应着输入。</i0> 在 <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1>中，你可以使用函数作为 <a2>程序</a2> 的一部分，作用于游戏的某些东西。并且 GML (GameMaker Language) 中有大量可用的函数，<a3>参考手册</a3>部分将作详细解释。 <br4>
The height of the GUI (-1 equals 1:1 with the display or application_surface).
GUI的高度 (-1 表面 与显示器或应用表面1:1的比例).
The height of the area in the source surface to copy from.
源表面层内，复制区域的高度。
The height of the area of the screen to capture
捕捉屏幕区域的高度。
The height of the new surface.
新的表面层的高度。
The height of the part to save.
保存部分的高度。
The height of the surface to be created.
创建的表面层的高度。

The height of the viewport (or combined view ports if more than one are active) define the height of the game window or background canvas <i0>at the start of the game</i0>, but changing this value after the game has started will have no visible effect on the game window size.
视口高度（有一个以上的可见视野时组合视口区域） <i0>在游戏开始时</i0>定义游戏窗口或者背景画布的高度，而游戏开始后改变这个值对窗口大小没有明显的影响。
The help <b0>Key Binding Editor</b0> permits you to re-assign the default <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> IDE keyboard shortcuts to those that you choose.
<b0>热键设定编辑器</b0> 允许你重新设计 <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> 集成开发环境的键盘快捷键。
The id of the view to compare the mouse position to.
比较鼠标位置的视野的id。

index.html 网页还可以自定义背景颜色或位置等...但是 HTML 语言必要的知识请查阅 <a2>Global game settings (游戏全局设置)</a2> 里的 <a1>HTML5 Tab (HTML5 选项卡)</a1>

The instance found beneath the mouse cursor will then have its information displayed in the Selected Instance window, where you can see it's built in and instance variables, the same as for the Instances window.
在鼠标指针下的实例的信息会显示在Selected Instance窗口中。在此处你能看到它的内置信息和实例变量，与实例窗口是一样的。
The last button permits you to select a room to be drawn as a background which can be very useful for giving you a "feel" for how the path will work in any given game room.

剩下的只是在你的电脑里找到合适的图片导入即可。

The license file will also be emailed to you using the email address you entered during purchase, and if you've logged into the YoYo Games store through the "My Account" section, it will also be tied to that account, allowing you to retrieve it at any time should that be necessary.
授权文件也会通过你购买时使用时邮箱地址发送给你，如果你已经通过 My Account (我的帐户) 登录到 YoYo 游戏商店，它也会绑定到该帐户，你可以在任何有必要的时候取回它。
The maximum height in pixels for the game window.

用于 OpenGL ES 加速的最新显卡驱动
The name of the canvas element to link the surface to.
所链接的画布元素名称。

保存的图像文件的名称。

窗口的新高度。

新资源会有个默认名称，并且打开属性窗口。

窗口的新的x坐标。

The next thing you should do is set up your room and views, as each surface will need to be associated with a specific view to "capture" the game images (see the view variable <a10><t11>view_surface_id[0...7]</t11></a10>).
下面你是设置房间和视野，因为每个表面层都需要关联一个特定的视野以捕捉游戏画面（查阅视野变量 <a10><t11>view_surface_id[0...7]</t11></a10>）。
The notification message text (a string)
通知的正文(字符串格式)
The notification title (a string)
通知的标题 (字符串格式)
The only exception to this rule is the <i1>Profile</i1> view, which updates in real time when enabled independently of the real-time switch, as it has its own on/off button.
此项规则唯一的例外是<i1>Profile（概况）</i1>视窗，它的启用与否是独立于实时更新开关以外的，它有自己的on/off开关。

The other two tags are used for giving the description and can be custom tags that you input (click the box and write the tag) or they can also be selected from a long list of pre-made descriptive tags accessed through another drop-down menu.<br0>
其他两个用于描述的标签可随意填写 (其中也有一些预定义标签可供选择))。 <br0>

The path editor has a center point (0,0) and its coordinate system works the same as for the room editor, in that down is +y, up is -y, right is +x and left is -x, and in this way you can plot your path around these coordinates.
路径编辑器有一个中心点（0，0），并且它的坐标系统是和房间编辑器相同的，也就是说向下y坐标递增，向上y坐标递减，向右x坐标递增，向左x坐标递减。这样你就可以根据这些坐标来绘制你的路径。
The possibilities are endless!<br0>
它有无限种可能性！<br0>

The speed difference is negligible for smaller arrays, but larger ones should be optimised as much as possible in this way.<br1>
对于小的数组，两种速度的差异微乎其微，但是大数组应该用这种方式优化。<br1>

The speed value is actually a percentage of the speed at which you make the instance move along the path, so if you start an instance at a speed of 2 (2 pixels per step) along a path and then one of the path points has a <b6>Sp</b6> value of 50, the instance will reduce speed as it approaches this point to a speed of 1 (50% of the path speed).
这个速度值实际上是个百分比，当实例经过这个点时速度会按照这个百分比改变。如果你的实例沿路径运动时的初始速度是2（2像素每步），然后其中一个路径点的 <b6>Sp</b6> 值为50，那么在实例运动经过这个路径点时，它的速度会减小为1（当前速度的50%）。

该字符串应该包含你所需要保存的游戏的 <i1>全部</i1> 信息 你只能上传一个二进制数据（ "data blob" ）到服务器上, 并且再次运行这个函数将覆盖之前存储的值 (如同使用 <a2><t3>cloud_file_save</t3></a2> 一样)。

There are a number of different versions of <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> available for you to use, and each one is designed to scale to the level of programming experience of the end-user, either with the <i1>GameMaker</i1> product or in general.
有许多不同的 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 版本供你选择，每一个版本的规模取决于最终用户的编程经验，无论是 <i1>GameMaker</i1> 产品或一般产品。

也有多个特别的函数用来全屏或部分截图，保存为图片文件：

There are also expression "short-cuts" called <b0>accessors</b0> for use with certain Data Structures, which enable you to add, or replace data within these formats quickly and easily and without the use of any function calls.
这些是表达式的“捷径”，叫做 <b0>访问器</b0> ，用于某些特定的数据结构，通过这些格式快捷地添加、替换数据，无需调用数据结构的函数。

There are many cases when you may want to do this, for example in a collision with a bullet object, you may want to find out how much damage the bullet does by accessing a variable in the bullet, or you might want to stop the motion of all the balls in a puzzle , or you might want to move the main character to a particular position, or any number of other situations you typically come across in any game.
在很多情况下你需要做到这一点，比如子弹的一次碰撞中，你可能想要通过访问了弹的变量知道子弹造成了多少伤害，或者你想要在谜题中让所有的球停下来，或者你想要将主角移动到特定地点，或任何你可能会在其它游戏中遇到的任何情况。
There are no functions in <i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3> to deal with remote notifications, as they must all be generated by your server and handled by the respective App Stores.
<i3>GameMaker: Studio</i3> 并不提供函数来处理远程通知, 因为他们都必须由服务器生成并需要通过各自的应用程序商店处理。

There is one final feature of the <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> GUI which is worth noting, and that is the search box that can be found to the top right of the IDE: <i1> If you are looking for more detailed information on a subject and the manual doesn't cover it (there are many things outside of the scope of this document) or you think there may be a bug, then you can type a few keywords here and it will search the <a2>YoYo Games Knowledge Base</a2> then open a tab in your browser showing you a list of the topics that are available.

这是 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> GUI 最后一个值得注意的地方，搜索框，可以在 IDE 的右上角找到: <i1> 如果你正在寻找更详细的信息，而主题和手册里都没有相关内容 (有很多此文档之外的东西) 或者你认为这儿可能是个 bug，那么你就可以在这里输入关键字搜索 <a2>YoYo Games 知识库</a2>，然后在浏览器的新打开的选项卡中就会列出你想要查询的相关主题列表。

These are usually large images that are used as backgrounds (or foregrounds) for the rooms in which the game takes place, but they can also be large images composed of many smaller ones called <i0>tiles</i0> which you can then place individually in your room to create complex visual designs for levels with far less processing overhead than you would get with objects and sprites.<br1>
通常用大图像作为房间的背景。但它们也可以是由许多名为 <i0>tiles (磁贴)</i0> 的小图像组成，它们只需要更小的开销。你会得到比物体和精灵更复杂的视觉设计。 <br1>

These files are much smaller than a wave file would be but have a small CPU overhead as they have to be decoded before being played, hence the limit of only one MP3 file being played at time (however, you can have multiple music tracks in your game, and you would just switch between them when necessary).<br10>
这些文件比 wave 文件小得多，但是有小的 CPU 消耗，因为它们在播放前会解码，因此同时只能播放一个 MP3 文件(不过，在你的游戏中可以有多个音乐曲目以便在需要时切换着使用)。<br10>

这些文件应该在测试前被删除或替换！

这些目标需要一个 Windows 8 操作系统来运行 (和测试)。<br3>

This application is a platform for distributing your games and for playing those made by others.
这个是发布游戏以及玩其它的人制作的游戏的一个平台。

代码现在拉伸绘制我们创建的表面至整个GUI 层。

实例创建时事件在对象创建时事件之 后执行。

This document is divided into three parts with the aim of getting you introduced to the interface and basic workings of <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> before going on to more advanced usage and the functions available through <b2>GML</b2> (the <i3>GameMaker Language</i3>).
这个文档分为三个部分，先是介绍了界面和<i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> 的基础使用，然后是高级应用，以及可用函数，也就是 <b2>GML</b2> (the <i3>GameMaker Language</i3>)。
This drop-down menu allows you to choose which device to target when compiling and testing your game.
此下拉菜单可以用选择的生成方式编译和测试你的游戏。
This extremely useful for doing repetitive tasks that would involve multiple lines of code in any other way, and is commonly used as a counter for evaluating arrays, or drawing things.
处理包含很多行代码的重复任务极其 有用，通常用来数组计数，或者绘制。
This first button will open the <a0>Steam Player</a0> where you can play any games you have subscribed to or uploaded to the <a1>Steam Workshop</a1>.<br2>
第一个按钮会打开 <a0>Steam Player</a0>，你可以在 <a1>Steam Workshop</a1> 订阅或上传任何游戏。<br2>
This flexibility is one of the main reasons why "for" loops are so important in programming.
这种灵活性也是“for”循环在编程中如此重要的原因。

This function Resets the display settings to the ones that were set when the game was started, but also allows you to change the current level of full screen anti-aliasing being used and whether to use vertical synchronisation.
这个函数将游戏开始时显示器的一些设置重置为某些值，也允许更改全屏抗锯齿的等级以及是否使用垂直同步。

This function allows you to attach a surface to a canvas element that already exists in your web page, meaning that you can effectively split up portions of your game to be drawn at various different places within the page.
这个函数允许你为已经存在网页上的canvas元素附著一个表面图层，意味着可以有效的分割游戏的部分页面，绘制到页面内的不同地方。
This function can be used to add a given value (real or string) to all the values of the cells found within the defined area of a grid.
这个函数可以被用于向一个栅格中一个确定区域内所有单元格的数值中叠加一个被给定的值（实数或字符串）。
This function can be used to add a given value (real or string) to all the values of the cells found within the defined disk area of a grid.
这个函数可以被用于向一个栅格中一个确定圆盘区域内所有单元格的数值中叠加一个被给定的值（实数或字符串）。
This function can be used to add a given value (real or string) to the value of the given cell within the grid.
这个函数可以被用于向一个栅格的被给定单元格的值叠加一个给定的值（实数或字符串）

This function can be used to add all the values of all the cells found within the source area of a grid to the values within the destination grid, as illustrated below: <i0> <i1><b2>NOTE:</b2> You can also use this function on the same grid to add values from one region of the grid to those stored in another (see code example below).</i1>
这个函数能被用于去把从源栅格中区域内找到的值叠加给一个靶栅格，正如下方插图所示 <i0> <i1><b2>注意：</b2> 你也能对同一栅格使用这个函数来把一片区域内的值叠加给另一片区域（详见下方代码）。</i1>
This function can be used to clear a given ds_grid to a specific value.
这个函数可以被用于用一个特定的数值清空一个被给定的栅格结构。
This function can be used to clear the entire screen (with no alpha blend) to the given colour, and is only for use in the draw event of an instance (it will not show if used in any other event).
这个函数用指定颜色来填充（清空）整个屏幕（没有透明度设定），它仅能用于实例的draw事件（用于其它事件时不发挥作用）。

This function can be used to clear the entire screen with a given colour and the alpha component of the destination is set to the value you have set - this function does <i0>not</i0> do any blending as it works but any subsequent blend operations can be set up to use the destination alpha that you have set.
这个函数可以用指定的颜色和透明度填充整个屏幕，屏幕原有图像的透明度保持不变 - 这个函数 <i0>不</i0> 会对原有图像的透明度与混合模式做任何修改。随后你可以再次修改其混合操作。
This function can be used to get the colour of a specific pixel from a surface, using the local coordinates of the surface where (0,0) is the top left corner.
此函数使用局部坐标，可用于从一个表面获取特定像素的颜色，其中（0,0）是表面层的左上角。
This function can be used to maximise the GUI layer and set it to be scaled and offset in relation to the screen dimensions, rather than the default application surface position and dimensions.
这个函数最大化GUI层，相对于屏幕尺寸进行缩放和偏移设置，而不是相对于默认的应用表面层的位置和尺寸。
This function can be used to set a local notification to be shown on a given date at a given time.
此函数用于设置一个给定时间日期的本地通知。
This function can be used to set a maximum window height for your game.
这个函数可以给游戏设置一个窗口的最大高度。
This function can be used to set a maximum window width for your game.
这个函数可以给游戏设置一个窗口的最大宽度。.
This function can be used to set a minimum window height for your game.
这个函数可以给游戏设置一个窗口的最小高度。
This function can be used to set a minimum window width for your game.
这个函数可以给你的游戏设置一个最小窗口宽度。
This function can set the background colour of the game window.
这个函数可以设置游戏窗口的背景颜色。
This function cancel the given push notification.
这个函数将会取消已有的推送通知。
This function has no effect on any other device.<br0>
这个函数对移动设备无效。<br0>
This function is essential when working with surfaces due to their volatile nature.
由于表面图层的不稳定性，在使用到表面时，这个函数还是有必要的。
This function is for use with the <a0>Shader Functions</a0> and sets the MRT (0 - 3) for native level shaders (DX9, DX11, OpenGL).<br1>
这个函数在 <a0>着色器函数</a0>中使用，在本地可用的着色器 (DX9, DX11, OpenGL)中设置 MRT (0 - 3)输出目标。<br1>
This function is really only useful for extension writers who need the <t1>window handle</t1> to call Win32 API's in DLL code.<br2>
当他们需要使用<t1>window handle</t1> 在DLL代码中调用 Win32 API的时候，这个函数对于插件作者非常有用。<br2>
This function is used to create a surface and will return the index of the surface which should be stored in a variable for future function calls.
这个函数被用来创建一个表面图层，而且将会返回这个表面的索引地址，这个索引应该储存在一个变量上，将来可以调用它。
This function returns a special <i0>pointer</i0> for the surface texture.
这个函数返回表面层纹理的特殊 <i0>指针</i0> 。
This function returns the amount of blue used to make the given colour, with the value being between 0 and 255, where 0 is no blue and 255 is all blue.
这个函数返回给定颜色的蓝色值，这个值在0到255之间，0代表不含有蓝色，255代表100%的蓝色。
This function returns the amount of green used to make the given colour, with the value being between 0 and 255, where 0 is no green and 255 is all green.
这个函数返回给定颜色的绿色值，这个值在0到255之间，0代表不含有绿色，255代表100%的绿色。.
This function returns the amount of red used to make the given colour, with the value being between 0 and 255, where 0 is no red and 255 is all red.
这个函数返回给定颜色的红色值，这个值在0到255之间，0代表不含有红色，255代表100%的红色。
This function returns the background colour of the game window.
这个函数返回游戏窗口的背景颜色。
This function returns the caption of the window (this is the text that appears on the top of the window, beside its icon) and by default this shows the caption of the room you're currently in.
此函数返回窗口的标题（窗口顶部图标旁边出现的标题文字），默认显示的是当前房间的标题。
This function returns the current value of the draw alpha, which will range between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (fully opaque).
这个函数返回当前的绘制透明度值，这个数值的范围是从0（完全透明）到1（完全不透明）。
This function returns the direction of a vector formed by the specified components [x1,y1] and [x2,y2] in relation to the fixed x/y coordinates of the room.
这个函数返回由特定的相对于房间的x/y坐标组件(x1,y1)和(x2,y2)形成的一个向量的方向。
This function returns the x-coordinate of the mouse with respect to all the active views and returns the same value <a0> <t1>mouse_x</t1></a0>.
这个函数返回相对于所有激活视野的鼠标x坐标（并且返回与 <a0> <t1>mouse_x</t1></a0>相同的值）。
This function returns the y-coordinate of the mouse with respect to all the active views and returns the same value <a0> <t1>mouse_y</t1></a0>.
这个函数返回相对于所有激活视野的鼠标y坐标（并且返回与 <a0> <t1>mouse_y</t1></a0>相同的值）。
This function returns whether the game window is in fullscreen mode (<t0>true</t0>) or not (<t1>false</t1>).
这个函数返回游戏窗口是否是全屏模式(<t0>为真</t0>)，或者不是 (<t1>为假</t1>)。
This function sets the angular damping value of a fixture.
这个函数 sets the angular damping value of a fixture.
This function should <i0>not</i0> be used very often as it is extremely slow and may cause a pause in your game.<br1>
此函数建议 <i0>不要</i0>频繁使用，因为它是极其缓慢，并且可能导致游戏脱帧。<br1>
This function simply returns the height, in pixels, of the indexed surface.<br0>
这个函数简单的返回索引表面的像素高度。<br0>
This function simply returns the width, in pixels, of the indexed surface.<br0>
这个函数简单的返回索引表面的像素宽度。<br0>

This function simply takes the image from one surface and copies it onto another one at the specified local position within that surface (where the (0,0) position is the top left corner of the destination surface).
这个函数简单的让图像从一个表面图层复制到另外一个表面特殊的位置（(0,0)表示在表面图层的左上角）。
This function will commit a file to the chosen cloud service for storage.
这个函数将提交一个文件到所选云服务用于存储。
This function will commit a string to the chosen cloud service for storage.
该函数将提交一个字符串到所选的云服务用于存储。
This function will get the dpi of the device display along the x axis (this value is also dependant on the orientation of the device).
这个函数将获取设置显示器x轴的dpi（这个值也依赖设备的方向）。
This function will get the dpi of the device display along the y axis (this value is also dependant on the orientation of the device).
这个函数将获取设置显示器y轴的dpi（这个值也依赖设备的方向）。

This function will only affect things drawn in the <a0>Draw GUI Event</a0> and can be used to set a specific width and height for all GUI components in that event, and no matter what size of display or window is used to display the GUI, it will be scaled to fit correctly.
此函数只会影响 <a0>Draw GUI Event</a0> 中的绘制的内容，并可以用来给那个事件中所有GUI组件设定特定的宽度和高度， 不管显示器或窗口之前是怎样显示GUI，都会缩放到适当的效果。
This function will populate a pre-made <a0><t1>ds_map</t1></a0> with a series of key/value pairs for the first local push notification in the queue to be shown.
这个函数将以一系列键值对儿（key/value pairs）的形式返回一个 <a0><t1>ds_map</t1></a0>作为本地通知队列中最先被显示的通知。
This function will populate a pre-made <a0><t1>ds_map</t1></a0> with a series of key/value pairs for the next local push notification in the queue to be shown.
这个函数以一系列键值对儿（key/value pairs）的形式返回一个 <a0><t1>ds_map</t1></a0> 作为本地通知队列中下一个被显示的通知。
This function will resize a surface to the given dimensions (in pixels).
这个函数将重置表面的大小为给定的长宽值（像素）。
This function will return <t0>true</t0> if the application surface is being used for drawing, or <t1>false</t1> if the screen buffer is being used.
如果使用应用表面层，这个函数将返回 <t0>真</t0> ， 或者如果使用屏幕缓存区返回 <t1>假</t1>。
This function will return one of two constant <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> has to tell you whether the device running the game is being held in landscape or portrait mode:
这个函数返回 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0>常量中的一个，告诉你运行游戏的设备是在横向模式还是纵向模式。
This function will return the current d3d device <i0>pointer</i0>, which you can then (for example) pass through to a DLL.<br1>
这个函数将返回当前d3d设备的 <i0>指针</i0>，然后你可以传递给DLL。<br1>
This function will return the height of the display (in pixels).
这个函数将返回显示器的高度（像素为单位）。
This function will return the hue of the given colour.
这个函数将返回给定颜色的色相。
This function will return the mouse x position relative to the view selected.
这个函数将返回相对于所选视野的鼠标x坐标。
This function will return the mouse x position within the <i0>screen</i0>.
这个函数返回 <i0>屏幕</i0>上鼠标指针的x坐标。
This function will return the mouse y position relative to the view selected.
这个函数将返回相对于所选视野的鼠标y坐标。
This function will return the mouse y position within the <i0>screen</i0>.
这个函数返回 <i0>屏幕</i0>鼠标位置的x坐标。
This function will return the saturation of the given colour.
这个函数将返回给定颜色的饱和度。
This function will return the smallest angle difference between two angles as a value between -180 and 180 degrees (where a positive angle is anti-clockwise and a negative angle clockwise).
这个函数将会返回两个角的最小角度差.
This function will return the value (luminosity) of the given colour.
这个函数将返回给定颜色的明度。
This function will return the width of the display (in pixels).
这个函数将返回显示器的宽度（以像素为单位）。
This function will save a part of a surface to disc using the given filename.
此函数将使用给定的文件名保存表面层到硬盘上。
This function will save a surface to disc using the given filename.
此函数将使用给定的文件名保存表面层到硬盘上。
This function will send off to the cloud for data, which will then trigger the appropriate asynchronous event.
这个函数用于向云端发送数据, 并触发相应的异步事件。

This function would be called in an event like the <a0>Game Start Event</a0> or in an object that is placed in the first room of your game, with the idea being that you check the current data blob from the cloud server to see if it is up to date or not.
这个函数会在 <a0>开始事件（Game Start Event）</a0> 或者当一个 object 被放置在你的游戏的第一个房间中时被调用，通过这种思路来从云端服务器检查是否有数据更新。
This function would normally be called at the start of a new game and is used to retrieve the current status of the cloud service at game start up.
这个函数通常在新的游戏的开始被调用，用于检索云端服务器上存储的游戏的启动。
This global scope, built-in variable can be used to access the application surface using any of the surface functions.
在全局的范围内，这个内置变量可以访问应用表面层，任何表面层函数都可以使用它。

This is because using the point method to access or change another instances value will give an error and crash the game if the instance does not exist.

This is not strictly necessary but is the optimal way to do it as it will reserve a space in memory that is the exact size of the array, whereas if you initialize an array from 0 upwards, the memory has to be re-allocated for every additional value added.
不是严格必要，但却是最好的方式，因为这样会精确地在内存中保留一个数组空间，而如果你从零开始初始化，内存将在每一次添加值时重新分配。

色相是一个“纯粹”的色调颜色，它是色彩的三元素（H-色调、S-饱和度、V-明度）之一。

<b3>Project Number</b3> 在你创建安卓工程时被创建。

在这个区域你可以编辑资源、创建房间、修改物体 、code (代码) 和其他资源。

数组的名字。

This is the main interface for <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> and it's here that you control every aspect of your current project.

This is useful for grouping objects and things of the same type together for easy referencing.
用于对资源更好地分类。

当你有一个含有很多子文件夹的大工程时这非常方便。

This simply means that you can tell your game to run the current line of code, then step onto the next one, permitting you to run through your entire game one line of code at a time should you wish.

This surface is basically a blank "canvas" that can then later be manipulated before being drawn to the screen when needed, and in most cases GameMaker: Studio handles this for you (although you can also manipulate it yourself in code for shaders, scaling and many other things - further details are given below).<br2>
表面层基本上是一个空的“画布”，创建后在绘制到屏幕之前，根据你的需要进行操作。多数情况下， GameMaker: Studio 已经为你作了处理（然而你也可以在代码中自己处理，使用到着色器、缩放或其它操作，详细下面会讲到）。<br2>
This surface is permanently available and is where the bulk of drawing is done by <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0>.
在 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0>所有块绘制完成的同时，这个表面会永久存在。

This type of notification is useful to set "reminders" for the user to play your game again, or to offer a daily reward for playing, etc... and when the user taps the notification it will launch the game and pass in a data string which can then be parsed by the game to give a reward or whatever.<br0>
这种类型的通知用于“召回”玩家再次运行游戏，或者用于每日奖励之类的事件......用户点击通知将启动游戏并传递一个字符串，解析数据来给玩家发放奖励或者进行其他你想要的操作。<br0>

This value can also be negative and so show an area that is outside of the room, in which case the <b0>window colour</b0> will be used (this colour can be set with <a1><t2>window_set_colour</t2></a1>).

This variable can be used to find out if a particular view is currently visible or not.
这个变量可以用来发现一个特定的视野当前是否可见。
This variable can be used to get or to set the height of the specified viewport.
这个变量可以用来获取或设置特定视口的高度。
This variable can be used to get or to set the height of the view in the room.
这个变量可以用来获取或设置房间视野的高度。
This variable can be used to get or to set the width of the specified viewport.
这个变量可以用来获取或设置特定视口的宽度。
This variable can be used to get or to set the width of the view in the room.
这个变量可以用来获取或设置房间视野的宽度。
This variable can be used to get or to set the x axis position for the view in the room.
这个变量可以用来获取或设置房间视野的x轴坐标。
This variable can be used to get or to set the y axis position for the view in the room.
这个变量可以用来获取或设置房间视野的y轴坐标。
This variable controls the horizontal movement speed of the view when it has an instance to follow (this can be set with the <a0><t1>view_object</t1></a0> variable or in the <a2>room editor</a2>).
视野有跟随物体时（这个可以用 <a0><t1>view_object</t1></a0> 变量设置或者在 <a2>房间编辑器</a2>中设置），这个变量控制控制视野的水平速度。
This variable controls the vertical movement speed of the view when it has an instance to follow (this can be set with the <a0><t1>view_object</t1></a0> variable or in the <a2>room editor</a2>).
视野有跟随物体时（这个可以用 <a0><t1>view_object</t1></a0> 变量设置或者在 <a2>房间编辑器</a2>中设置），这个变量控制控制视野的垂直速度。
This variable controls whether any views that are visible within the room are enabled or not.
这个变量将控制房间内任何可见视野是否启用。This variable controls whether any views that are visible within the room are enabled or not.
This variable holds a different constant depending on the orientation of the device.
这个变量根据设备的方位保存不同的常量。
This variable sets the horizontal border width for view following.
这个变量设置视野跟随的水平边界框的宽度。.

这个变量设置视野跟随的垂直边界框的宽度。
This variable will return a value based on the setting of bits for the different levels.
这个变量基于不同等级设置的比特值返回一个值。

This varies between platforms, but iOS is particularly limited - the apple service only delivers the most recent notification, which must be selected by the recipient for the payload data to be delivered to your async event, and these notifications have a mximum payload size of 256bytes.
虽然有很多的平台, 但是只有在 iOS 上苹果的服务特别限制仅发送最新的通知，必须通过有效的数据传递给你的异步事件，能够被接收到的有效数据的大小为256个字节。
This version is free to download and use, as it is designed to permit the end-user to test the functions of the product before upgrading to a more powerful version.

This watch enables you to see exactly what is being drawn to any surfaces you have in your game (including the <t0>application surface</t0>) as well as see the texture pages that are in memory.
在此视图中允许你查看到底哪些东西正画在你的表面上（包括<t0>应用表面</t0>）以及查看内存中的材质页。

这个窗口为你显示所有被渲染当前帧的可用信息，例如绘制的透明度或者填充颜色。

This will also open another part of the object window where you can define the physical properties of all instances of this object.
这将会打开物体窗口的另一部分，在这里你可以定义物体的物理属性。

这将用蓝色填充整个屏幕。

这样就会展开整个结构内容，并且，在观察的视窗中，也允许你修改它们的值。<br6>

这将会打开另一个窗口，它会检测并显示你当前按下的按键:: <i3> 你需要按住组合键三秒，然后该组合键就会被添加到选定命令的热键。
This will open the following window: <i17> This window has some buttons to help you establish a standard range for your font -
这会弹出以下窗口：<i17> 这个窗口中有一些按钮来帮助你建立一个标准的字体范围
This will return the colour of the pixel at coordinates (56,78) of the surface indexed in the variable "surf".
这将返回索引为“surf”的表面在在坐标（56,78）位置的像素的颜色。
This will set a timer to "push" a notification to the device when one day has passed.
设置一个定时器在一天后向设备“推送”一个通知。
This will set the GUI layer to have a 1:1 scale again and set the draw position to the (0,0) position of the application surface rather than the display or window.
这个操作会再次设置以1:1的比例，(0,0)的位置，相对于应用表面层作出改变，而不是显示器或窗口。
This will then generate your iOS or Mac app for you.

这样一来就需要你手动定义IP来连接，然后IP会被存起来以便日后使用。</i5>
This will then prompt you to add a file, or files if your select more than one, to the list.
随后软件会提示你添加一个或多个你选择的文件到列表中。

This will trigger an <b9>Asynchronous Push Notification Event</b9>, and the <t10>ds_map</t10> key "<i11>type</i11>" will have the value "<i12>register</i12>" as well as a new key, "<i13>reg_id</i13>", containing the <b14>registration id</b14> (or an error message in the "<i15>error</i15>" key, if "<i16>status</i16>" is 0).

这将触发一个 <b9>异步推送通知事件（Asynchronous Push Notification Event）</b9>，你会得到一个 <t10>ds_map</t10> 数组，他的key "<i11>type</i11>" 的值为 "<i12>register</i12>" ，key"<i13>reg_id</i13>"的值为 <b14>注册ID（registration id）</b14> (如果在"<i15>error</i15>" 的"<i16>status</i16>" 为 0 的话说明发生了错误)。
This will, again, let you retrieve your <i5>GameMaker: Studio</i5> License code from the YoYo Games website.
这些也可以让你从 YoYo 游戏网站找回你的 <i5>GameMaker: Studio</i5>许可证。
This window is for when you select an instance from your game.
这个窗口是为了你在游戏中选择的实例而存在的。
This window is for you to add a specific variable that you want to keep track of.
这个窗口可以让你添加你想一直追踪的特定的变量。

This window is where you can see the current system profile for the game being tested where you can check everything in your game from whole events to individual function calls to see how they are performing and spot any trouble areas or bottlenecks.
该窗口是你查看当前被测试游戏所处系统概况的地方，在此处你能查看你游戏中从整个事件到单独的函数调用中的各种细节，以此了解程序如何表现它们的功能，而麻烦区域或者瓶颈又在哪里。
This window simply shows the output of the compiler (as shown in the main IDE compiler window).
这个窗口仅仅会显示编译器的输出（正如主IDE编译器窗口中显示的一样）。
This window will display the current call stack of events, as well as the line number for the code being stepped through.
这个窗口会显示当前事件的调用栈，还有按步跳过代码的行号。
This works as follows - First statement1 is executed, then the expression is evaluated and, if it is true, statement 3 is executed.
工作原理 - 首先执行语句1，然后判断表达式，表达式为真则执行语句3。
This works as follows:
工作流程如下：
This would add "." to all the strings held in the cells within the defined region of the ds_grid referenced by the variable "grid".
这将会向索引为变量"grid"的栅格结构中确定区域内的单元格中的所有字符串叠加一个"."。
This would add 2 to all the values held in the cells within the defined disk area of the ds_grid referenced by the variable "grid".
这将会向索引为变量"grid"的栅格结构中确定圆盘区域内的单元格中的所有值叠加2。
This would add 6 to the given cell within the ds_grid referenced by the variable "grid".
这将会向索引为变量"grid"的栅格结构中被给定的单元格叠加6.
This would set my_x to the x coordinate of the mouse relative to the display.
上述将设置 my_x 等于相对于显示器的鼠标x坐标。
This would set my_y to the y coordinate of the mouse relative to the display.
上述将设置 my_y 为屏幕上的鼠标的y坐标。
This would set myx to the x coordinate of the mouse in the window relative to all active views.
这个将设置myx 等于窗口中相对于所有激活视野的鼠标x坐标。
This would set myy to the y coordinate of the mouse in the window relative to all active views.
这个将设置myy 等于窗口中相对于所有激活视野的鼠标y坐标。
This would set the variable "dpx" to the dpi value of the x axis.
设置变量“dpx”等于x轴的dpi值。
This would set the variable "dpy" to the dpi value of the y axis.
设置变量“dpy”等于y轴的dpi值。
This would set the variable "myheight" to the display's height.
设置变量“myheight”为显示器的高度。
This would set the variable "mywidth" to the display's width.
设置变量“mywidth”为显示器的宽度。
Time Lines
时间轴
Timelines
时间轴
Timelines offer you a way to create and control instances and actions over a set time period.
时间轴功能让你能够根据一组时间节点来创建和控制实例以及动作。
To access the available modules, you must run your Steam Client, go to the Library and right click on the <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> entry.
要访问可用的模块，必须运行你的Steam客户端，找到游戏库，右键点击 <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> 条目。
To access this surface, you need to use the built-in global variable <t2>application_surface</t2> which is explained on the following page:
若要访问这个表面层，你需要用到内置变量<t2>application_surface</t2>，接下来的章节会进行解释：
To achieve this you can make a time line where you start with setting a motion to the left.
要做到这个，你可以通过创建一个时间轴，在起始时间设置向左运动。

To add a file to your resources you must right-click on the <b7>Included Files</b7> section of the resource tree and select <b8>Create Included File</b8> or, if you want to create a sub-directory to store other files, <b9>Create Group</b9>.
要向资源中添加一个文件，你必须右击资源列表中的 <b7>Included Files</b7> 项，然后选择 <b8>Create Included File</b8>；或者如果你想要创建一个文件夹来储存其它文件，那么选择 <b9>Create Group</b9>。
To add a sound resource to your game, use the <a0>Resource</a0> menu or right-click on the resource tree and select <b1>Create Sound</b1>, or you can use the corresponding button on the toolbar.
你可以使用 <a0>Resource</a0> 菜单或右键点击资源树选择 <b1>Create Sound</b1> 或使用工具栏上相应的按钮添加声音资源。
To assign a path to an instance of an object, you can use the path actions (covered in the section <a0>Actions - Move Actions</a0>) or you can use code.
要在一个物体的实例上绑定一个路径，你可以使用路径动作（<a0>动作 - 运动动作</a0>章节有详细介绍），或者可以使用代码来完成。
To begin creating your first game project, you can click on either the <b0>New Project</b0> tab, where you can select to either load a previous project, or start a new one.
你可以点击 <b0>New Project</b0> 选项卡创建你的第一个游戏工程。在这里你可以选择加载老版本工程或者新建一个工程。
To call a script from within a piece of code, just act the same way as when calling functions - that is, write the script name with the argument values in parentheses.
在一个代码块中调用脚本就像调用函数一样 - 使用脚本的名字，括号内填写参数的值。
To change a Key, simply <i0>right-click</i0> on it and select the key, or key combination, that you require from the lists presented and your shortcut will be created.
要改变按键，只需要 <i0>右击</i0> 需要修改的的按键，并选择按键、或组合键，然后它就会出现在列表中，你的自定义快捷键将被创建。
To create a background resource in your game, use the <b3>Create Background</b3> option from the drop-down <b4>Resources</b4> menu or use the corresponding button on the toolbar.
用 <b4>Resources</b4> 下拉菜单的 <b3>Create Background</b3> 选项或者工具栏上相应的按钮创建背景。

To create a font resource in your game, use the item <b5>Create Font</b5> in the <b6>Resources</b6> menu or use the corresponding button on the toolbar, which will cause the following window to pop up: <i7> As with all resources, you should give your font resource a unique name so that you (and <i8>GameMaker: Studio</i8>) can identify it while writing your game.
要在你的游戏中创建一个字体资源，你可以点击 <b6>Resources</b6> 菜单中的 <b5>Create Font</b5> ，或者点击工具栏对应的按钮，之后会弹出以下窗口： <i7>就和其它资源一样，每个字体资源你都需要指定一个独一无二的名称，这样你（以及 <i8>GameMaker: Studio</i8>）才可以在编写游戏时区分不同的资源。

To create a new path resource in your game, choose <b0>Create Path</b0> from the <b1>Resources</b1> menu (or <t2>right click</t2> on the path resource and select <b3>Create Path</b3>), which will open the following window where you can create a new path (the image shows a path already created): <i4> As you can see, most of the path editor is taken up with the a visual representation of the space your path is drawn in, but around the edges there are a number of buttons, tabs and information bars that are there to help you in the task of creating and changing the paths you make.

要在游戏中创建新的路径，只需要点击 <b1>Resources</b1> 菜单中的 <b0>Create Path</b0> 选项（或者<t2>右击</t2> 路径资源然后选择 <b3>Create Path</b3>，在接下来的窗口中你可以创建一个新路径（下图中已经创建了一条路径）：<i4> 如你所见，占了路径编辑器绝大部分的是展示你绘制的路径的可视化界面，但是在编辑器边缘还有许多的按钮、选项卡和信息栏，这些工具帮你完成路径的创建和修改。.
To create a sprite, choose the item <b5>Create Sprite</b5> from the <b6>Resources</b6> menu, or use the corresponding button on the toolbar.

When doing multiple operations in a single expression, it is <b2>very important</b2> that you use brackets () to separate out the order of operation, as different platforms may perform them differently if nor explicitly stated in this way.
当一个表达式做多项运算时，使用括号“()”分离出运算顺序，这将 <b2>非常重要</b2>，如果没有明确的用这种方法表明，不同的平台执行上可能会有所不同。和gm不同，GMS可以在全局游戏设定（Global Game Setting）中开启短路求值（Short-Circuit evaluations）。
When instances are drawn on the screen they are drawn in order of depth, with instances that have the highest depth being drawn first and instances with the lowest depth being drawn last.
深度越高越先绘制。
When just running games, the memory requirements are less severe and depend a lot on the type of game as well as the resources being used.<br6>
内存需求很大程度上取决于游戏类型以及所使用的资源。<br6>

When making games, it is often necessary to store information about the game state in a file of some type, but storing this information on the device is not always the best option as, if the player deleted the game and then re-installs, this information may be lost.
在游戏开发过程中，常常需要将游戏的状态信息保存在特定类型的文件中，但是把这些信息保存在本地设备上在大多数时候并不是一个好的选择，因为当玩家在卸载游戏之后重新安装时，这些数据可能会丢失。

When making your game, they can be added at any time using <t1>f9</t1> (or using the right mouse button and selecting "toggle breakpoint"), either on an action in the object window, or on a line in a code editor window.
当制作游戏的时候，你可以用<t1>F9</t1>来添加断点（或者使用鼠标右击然后选择“添加断点”），不管是在物体（object）窗口中的动作（action）上还是在编辑窗口中的代码行中。
When passing in arguments as an array of values you can use <a9><t10>argument_count</t10></a9> to find out how many there are and adapt the script to use only those arguments supplied.
当使用参数数组的形式传递参数，你可以使用 <a9><t10>argument_count</t10></a9>得知使用了多少个参数，从而自动适应只使用传入的参数（即可选参数）。
When set to <t0>true</t0> (and you have vSync active) an alternative method will be used to that which is the default, with the aim to reduce any possible visual lag or stuttering of your game.
当设置为 <t0>true</t0> （并且激活了垂直同步）时，替代方法将被使用，取代默认的方法，以减少任何可能的视觉延迟。

当创建新工程的时候，你可以选择工程保存的目录 (将使用 *.GMX 格式保存)以及工程名。

When the day is up, if your game is either in the background or not running, a notification will be shown to the user with the given title and message (on iOS, the game name is shown and the title is ignored), and then an asynchronous Push Notification Event will be called.
一天以后，无论你的程序是在后台还是未启动状态，玩家都将收到之前设置的通知（在iOS平台标题被游戏的名字替代了），然后一个异步的推送通知事件（Push Notification Event）会被触发。

当文件名以 _stripXX 结尾，会被认为包含 XX 个子图像，<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 将会如此加载。

When the surface is first created, it may contain "noise" as basically it is just an area of memory that is put aside for the purpose (and that memory may still contain information), so you may want to clear the surface before use with a function like <a0><t1>draw_clear_alpha</t1></a0>.<br2>
第一次创建的表面图层可能会包含一些“噪音”，基本上是因为它只是为了特别目的而放置一边的内存区域（并且那个内存可能仍然包含信息），所以你可能会需要在使用之前用<a0><t1>draw_clear_alpha</t1></a0>这样的函数清理这个表面图层。<br2>

When the surface is first created, it may contain "noise" as basically it is just an area of memory that is put aside for the purpose (and that memory may still contain information), so you may want to clear the surface before use with a function like <a13><t14>draw_clear_alpha</t14></a13>.<br15>
当这个表面首次被创建的时候，它可能会包含“噪音”，因为基本上它只是一个为特别的目的而搁置的内存区域（这个内存可能仍然包含信息），所以你可以会用到这个函数 <a13><t14>draw_clear_alpha</t14></a13>清理表面层。<br15>

When using scripts or pieces of code you have more control over the way the path is executed, and there are a variety of functions that cover basic actions like starting the path (see <a1>Reference - Paths</a1>), and more complex actions like modifying and changing path points from within the game (see <a2>Reference - Changing Paths</a2>).
当你使用脚本或者一小段代码片段时，你对于路径是如何工作的可以有更多的选择，同时我们有不少现成的函数来完成一些基础的路径动作，比如沿路径运动（参见 <a1>代码参考 - 路径</a1>），以及更加复杂的函数，比如在游戏中修改一个路径上的路径点（参见 <a2>代码参考 - 改变路径</a2>）。

When you are working with surfaces, you should always use this function whenever you are finished using them.
当你用到表面图层时，不论是否结束使用，你应该一直使用这个函数。
When you check this box you are telling <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> that this object should be part of a physics world.
当你选中这个复选框的时候，就是告诉 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 这个物体应该作为物理世界的一部分。
When you create a script, you want to access the arguments passed to it, either when using the script action, or when calling the script as a function from a program (or from another script).
当你在他j建一个脚本，你或者想向它传递参数，或者使用脚本动作，或者在程序中调用脚本（或者其它脚本中）。

When you have "maintain aspect ratio" ticked in the Global Game Settings for a target platform, <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> will automatically set the draw position for the application surface so that it is displayed correctly centered and scaled on the given display.
当你在全局游戏设定中为一个目标平台打开“保持纵横比”，<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 将自动设置应用表面层的绘制位置，让显示器正确的居中放大显示。
When you have found the sprite you need and selected the transparency options you like, press <b25>Open</b25> to load the sprite into <i26>GameMaker: Studio</i26>.<br27>
选好了这些选项按下 <b25>Open</b25> 按钮把 sprite 载入 <i26>GameMaker: Studio</i26>。<br27>
When you load an animated gif, the different images of the animation automatically form the sprite subimages.
当你加载一个 gif 动画，动画不同的帧将自动分割成 sprites 不同的帧

When you open the editor you will be presented with the following window: <i2> Along the top of the window are the tabs for each of the editors available, as well as a "General" tab for the main IDE keyboard shortcuts.
当你打开编辑器你将看到如下窗口: <i2> 在窗口顶部的选项卡对应着每个编辑器，再加上 "General (通用)" 选项卡配置整个集成开发环境。

When you put instances in a room in the room editor, this instance id is shown at the bottom of the screen when you hover the mouse cursor over the instance, but even if you create an instance through code it still has its unique id number.
当你在一个房间（房间编辑器）里放置实例，鼠标悬放在实例上会在编辑器状态栏看到实例ID，甚至使用代创建的实例也会有一个独立的id数值。
When you run your game, this surface is created the first time that the draw event is called in each new room that you enter, which means that nothing is drawn until that point.
当你运行游戏时，在进入每个新房间调用绘制事件的第一时间会创建这个表面， 这意味着在那之前什么都不会绘制。

When you select the <b0>Create Executable</b0> for Steam Workshop, a new window will open where you must specify certain details that Steam require for you to upload to their site: <i1> At the top of the window, you should add the name of your game (this is what people will see displayed on Steam), then upload a screenshot to show something of your game itself.
当你选择 <b0>Create Executable</b0> 按钮创建 Steam 创意工坊文件，将打开新的窗口，你必须确定细节以上传到 Steam 的网站，如下图: <i1> 在窗口顶部，你可以看到游戏名 (人们在 Steam 里将会看到的)，然后上传你的游戏截图。

When you want to draw text in your game this text is drawn in a standard Arial 12 points font, but to make more interesting or unique looking texts you will probably want to use different fonts, however.
当你想要在游戏中绘制文字时，这些文字是使用标准的 Arial 12 号字体绘制的。但是为了让你的游戏看起来更独特更有趣，你可能想要使用不同的字体。
Where the GUI is positioned (ie: the (0,0) position) will depend on whether you have used the function <a1><t2>display_set_gui_maximise()</t2></a1> or not.
GUI放置的位置 (比如 (0,0)位置)取决于你是否使用这个函数 <a1><t2>display_set_gui_maximise()</t2></a1> 。
Whether the particular view is visible on the screen.
是否指定的视野会在屏幕上显示。
Whether to set the screen to fullscreen (true) or not (false).
设置屏幕为全屏（true）或不是（false）。
Whether views are enabled or not.
是否启用视野。
While <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> itself does not require an internet connection to be used, it will require occasional access to maintain the license activated.
<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 使用时本身并不要求联接互联网，它只是偶尔访问以保持许可证激活。

While <i13>GameMaker: Studio</i13> is a powerful tool, it cannot do everything for you at the touch of a button so start small with simple examples and you will realize that not only is creating games great fun, but that learning to use <i14>GameMaker: Studio</i14> to do it is also very rewarding!<br15>
而 <i13>GameMaker: Studio</i13> 是一个强大的工具，它不能够为您提供一个创造一切的按钮，所以从简单的例子开始，您会意识到，不仅制作游戏很好玩，而且学习<i14>GameMaker: Studio</i14> 也是值得的！<br15>

While creating and testing your game, this target module will work exactly the same as the standard Windows module, however when creating your final executable you will be shown additional options to submit the game directly to Steam.
当创建和测试您的游戏，额外的模块将会以标准的windows模块运行，然后当您创建最终exe可执行程序时将显示 直接提交到steam 的额外选项。

为什么呢？

您可以使用 <i4>GameMaker: Studio</i4> 迅速并轻松地开始创造您自己的电脑游戏，并且不需要学习任何一门编程语言。<br5>

在调试模块中，你能在任何时间任何代码块中设定断点，你也能在<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> IDE中来设置。

手册前面的部分讲解了如何创建一个游戏，但是当游戏完成时你肯定希望其他人可以玩它。
With the professional version of <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> all limitations are removed and you can experiment with all the features of the program:
专业版 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 中所有限制被移除，你可以实验程序的特点:
