到目前为止你可以添加漂亮的图像和优美的声音资源，但是它们还没有在游戏内做任何事！
With this function you can center the game window in the display when the target module is Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS, or you can center it in the browser if the target module is HTML5.
对于Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) 或者 MacOS 平台， 你可以使用这个函数将游戏窗口屏幕居中，而对于HTML5目标模块，是浏览器居中。
With this function you can change or set the position of the mouse within the game display which can be useful for FPS games, for example.
有了这个函数，你便可以更改或设置游戏屏幕上的鼠标位置，对于FPS游戏来说，这可能会比较好用。
With this function you can change or set the position of the mouse within the game window which can be useful for FPS games, for example.
有了这个函数，你可以更改游戏窗口的鼠标位置，这在FPS游戏中非常有用。
With this function you can change or set the windows caption for the room that you are currently in.
有了这个函数，你可以更改或设置当前所在房间的窗口标题。
With this function you can change the size of the game window.
有了这个函数，你可能更改游戏窗口的大小。
With this function you can copy the contents of one grid into another one.
使用这个函数你能够把一个栅格内的内容复制给另一个。
With this function you can enable or disable the application surface.
可以用这个函数启用或禁用应用表面层。
With this function you can find the overlapping region of the rectangle defined by (x1,y1) to (x2,y2) on each of the attached displays.
使用这个函数你可以查找 (x1,y1) 到 (x2,y2)矩形范围内的每个附加显示器的重叠区域。

With this function you can get the current cursor being used in the game window, with the return value being any one of the constants listed below (to set the current cursor being used you can use the function <a0><t1>window_set_cursor</t1></a0> which also takes these constants):
可以用这个函数获得当前游戏窗口使用的鼠标指针，返回值将下面所列的常量中的一个（设置当前的鼠标指针可以使用这个函数 <a0><t1>window_set_cursor</t1></a0> ，同样也是使用下面的常量）：
With this function you can get the current height (in pixels) of the game window.
这个函数可以获取游戏窗口的高度（像素为单位）。
With this function you can get the current width (in pixels) of the game window.
通过这个函数获取游戏窗口当前宽度（像素为单位）。
With this function you can get the full <b0>abgr 32bit</b0> value of any pixel of a (previously created) surface.<br1>
用这个函数获取一个预先创建好的表面的 <b0>abgr 32位</b0>真彩色。<br1>
With this function you can get the height (in pixels) of the GUI as used in the <a0>Draw Gui Event</a0>.
用这个函数获取 <a0>Draw Gui Event</a0>中已使用（绘制内容）的像素高度。
With this function you can get the internal Windows id value (a <i0>pointer</i0>).
有人这个函数，你可以获取内置的窗口ID的值 (a <i0>指针</i0>)。
With this function you can get the width (in pixels) of the GUI as used in the <a0>Draw Gui Event</a0>.
使用这个函数获取 <a0>Draw Gui Event</a0>中已使用（绘制内容）的像素高度。
With this function you can get the x position (in pixels) within the browser if it is an HTML5 game or within the display if it is a Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS game.
通过这个函数，你将获取HTML5游戏浏览器内窗口的x坐标，或者者Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) 或者 MacOS 游戏显示屏内的窗口坐标。
With this function you can get the x position of the mouse cursor (in pixels) within the browser if it is an HTML5 game or within the display if it is a Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS game.
有人这个函数，你可获得游戏窗口的鼠标指针的x坐标（像素为单位），如果是HTML5游戏则位于浏览器之内，如果是 Windows、 Ubuntu (Linux)或 MacOS 游戏，则位于显示屏以内。.
With this function you can get the y position (in pixels) within the browser if it is an HTML5 game or within the display if it is a Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS game.
通过这个函数，你将获取HTML5游戏浏览器内窗口的y坐标，或者者Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) 或者 MacOS 游戏显示屏内的窗口y坐标。
With this function you can get the y position of the mouse cursor (in pixels) within the browser if it is an HTML5 game or within the display if it is a Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS game.
有人这个函数，你可获得游戏窗口的鼠标指针的y坐标（像素为单位），如果是HTML5游戏则位于浏览器之内，如果是 Windows、 Ubuntu (Linux)或 MacOS 游戏，则位于显示屏以内。.
With this function you can poll the window (or tab) state and if it loses focus the function will return <t0>false</t0> otherwise it will return <t1>true</t1>.
有了这个函数，你可以查询窗口（标签）的状态，如果失去焦点，函数将返回 <t0>false</t0> ，否则返回 <t1>true</t1>。
With this function you can save a screenshot of a part of the game as it currently appears in the game window or browser.
使用这个函数可以对当前游戏窗口浏览器显示的内容的一部分进行截图保存。
With this function you can save a screenshot of the game as it currently appears in the game window or browser.
使用这个函数可以对当前游戏窗口浏览器显示的内容截图保存。

With this function you can set the cursor for the game window to any one of the constants listed below (to find the current cursor being used you can use the function <a0><t1>window_get_cursor</t1></a0> which will also return one of these constants):
有了这个函数，你可以设置游戏窗口的光标为下面列出的任意一个常量（获取当前使用的光标可以使用函数<a0><t1>window_get_cursor</t1></a0> ，它将返回这些常量中的一个）：
With this function you can set the game window to a specific position within the display (on MacOS, Linux(Ubuntu) and Windows) or within the browser (HTML5).
有了这个函数，你可以设置游戏窗口至显示器内的特定位置 （适用 MacOS, Linux（Ubuntu） 和 Windows） 或者浏览器内 （HTML5）。
With this function you can set the game window to be full screen (<t0>true</t0>) or not (<t1>false</t1>).
有了这个函数，你可以设置游戏窗口为全屏幕（<t0>true</t0>）或者不是全屏（<t1>false</t1>）。
With this function you can set the position of the game window within the browser (HTML5) or display (Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS) <i0>and</i0> set the scale of the window too.
有了这个函数，你可以设置浏览器内（HTML5）或者显示器内（Windows、 Ubuntu （Linux）或者 MacOS）游戏窗口的位置<i0>和</i0> 大小。
With this function you reset all further drawing from the target surface back to the screen.
用这个函数重置后面所有的绘制，从目标表面层返回到屏幕上。

With this function you set all further drawing to the target surface rather than the screen and in this way you can tell <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> to only draw specific things to the specified surface.
使用这个函数可以设置接下来的绘制为目标表面层而不是屏幕，用这种方法告诉<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 只绘制特定的内容到特定的表面层。
With this variable you can get (or set) the object that has to be kept in the specified view (from 0 to 7) at all times.
有了这个变量，你可以获取（或设置）在任何时候都保持指定在视野（0-7）的物体。
With this variable you can get or set the x position of the view port.
有了这个变量，可以获取或设置视口的x坐标。
With this variable you can get or set the y position of the view port.
有了这个变量，可以获取或设置视口的y坐标。
With this variable you can set a given view to draw to a surface, or get the current surface id if one has been assigned to a view.
有了这个变量，你可以设置一个给定的视野绘制到一个表面上，或者如果已经指定给了一个视野，获取它当前表面的id。
With this variable, you can get (or set) the angle at which the view is to be drawn.
有了这个变量，你可以获取（或设置）正在绘制的视野的角度。
X position of the view in the room.
房间视野的X坐标。
Y position of the view in the room.
房间视野的Y坐标。
You also have a couple of specialist functions that are designed only for use with the application surface:
你也有只为应用表面专门设计的函数可以使用：
You are asked for a new name before saving.
保存前会被询问新名字。
You are free to distribute the games you create with <i5>GameMaker: Studio</i5> in any way you like, and this means that you can even sell them!
你可以用任何你喜欢的方式发布你用 <i5>GameMaker: Studio</i5> 创建的游戏，这意味着可以卖给别人！
You are given the option to install the program anywhere you like but it is recommended that you follow the default suggestions given.
您可以选择任何您喜欢的目录安装本程序，但建议您选择的默认的位置进行安装。

You are not actually passing the array itself into the script (as you would a variable), but instead you are requesting that the script create a <i1>copy</i1> of this array, which you will change in the script.
你不是传递这个数组自身（数组变量），代替的是要求脚本创建这个数组的<i1>拷贝（副本）</i1>，脚本中可以随意更改。

You can add points to the path using the <b0>Add</b0> button, which will add a new point to the path, but at the <i1>same position</i1> as the previous path point created (or at the path start position if none have been created yet).
你可以用 <b0>Add</b0> 按钮来向路径中添加路径点，这个新的路径点的位置会和你添加的最后一个路径点<i1>重合</i1>（或者如果当前路径中没有路径点，那么这个新的点就会成为起始路径点）。

You can also access a single instance of an object when there are multiple instances within the room using the <b6>instance id</b6> to tell <i7>GameMaker: Studio</i7> exactly which instance we wish to address.
当你知道房间里有一个物体的多个实例时，你也可以访问物体的单个实例，使用 <b6>实例的“id”</b6>告诉 <i7>GameMaker: Studio</i7> 具体想要访问哪个实例。
You can also add or subtract <i6>one</i6> from a value using <b7>++</b7>, <b8>--</b8>.
你甚至可以用以下符号加减<i6>一</i6> ： <b7>++</b7>，<b8>--</b8>。
You can also assign a single instance id to this variable, in which case that particular instance is followed.
你也可以指定一个单独的实例id给这个变量，视野会跟随这个特别的实例。
You can also call up the properties by double clicking on the resource.
也可以用双击资源来实现。
You can also change some of the values for the variables shown by simply <i3>double-clicking</i3> on the value and giving it a new one.
你也仅通过在变量上<i3>双击</i3>来改变其中某些变量，赋予其新的值。
You can also choose whether the conversion should be mono, stereo or 3D.
你还可以选择是否转换为单声道、立体声或 3D。
You can also delete an array simply by "re-assigning" the variable that defines it to a single value.
删除一个数组仅需要对定义它的变量重新赋予一个值。
You can also do checks and run code on parent objects which automatically include the child objects too which saves a lot of time and energy.
你也可以在检测和执行父对代码的同时自动包含子对去节省大量的时间和精力。
You can also filter the resource tree to only show those things that are of interest to you using the search and filter options at the bottom:<br6>
你还可以通过资源树底部的搜索和过滤设置来选择资源树里只显示你感兴趣的东西:<br6>
You can also find many more sprites on the web, normally in the form of PNG strips or animated GIFs.<br3>
你也可以在网上找更多的精灵，通常是 PNG 或 GIF 格式的动画。<br3>
You can also get additional modules which will permit you to export to additional platforms like HTML5, Android, iOS and Windows Phone:
您也可以通过获取额外的模块来使您的游戏可以发布到例如 HTML5, Android, iOS and Windows Phone 等平台:
You can also have multiple wave files playing at once, which is why you should use these for all the sound effects in your game.<br6>
你也可以同时播放多个 wave 文件。这就是为什么你应该使用 wave 文件作为音效的原因。 <br6>
You can also indicate an offset (in pixels) where the top left-most tile starts as well as a separation between the tiles (in pixels) between the tiles themselves.
你也可以设置左方和上方的偏移量 (像素为单位) 以及磁贴之间的分离量 (像素为单位)。

You can also read this variable to get the index of the surface that has been assigned to the chosen view or it will return -1 if no surface has been assigned, and generally the surface used for this function should be the size of the view itself (not the view port).
你可以读取这个变量以获取选择的表面的已经指定的表面的索引，如果没有指定表面则返回-1，并且一般用于这个函数的表面应该和视野一样大小（不是视口）。
You can also refresh the feed (to check for new files) by clicking the button at the bottom left of the window.
你也可以通过点击窗口左下按钮刷新 feed (检查新文件)。
You can also see the state of any built in or instance variables that they have, and you can <i0>right-click</i0> on a value to set its type (see <b1>Data Types</b1>, below)
你也可以观察任何内置的变量或者它们拥有的实例的变量的状态，然后你可以<i0>右击</i0>在值上面来设定它的类型（见下文的<b1>数据类型</b1>）。
You can also select to import Legacy GameMaker files with the extensions <t4>gm81</t4>, <t5>gmk</t5>, <t6>gm6</t6> or <t7>gb1...n</t7> files from here.
你也可以导入老版本的 GameMaker 文件例如 <t4>gm81</t4>、<t5>gmk</t5>、<t6>gm6</t6> 或是 <t7>gb1...n</t7> 文件。
You can also set the speed to follow the path and a number of other actions relating to the position and orientation of the path within the room.
同时你也可以设置沿路径运动时的速度，以及在运动到不同位置及方向时执行不同的动作。
You can also set this variable to effectively turn "on" or "off" a view by setting the value to <t0>true</t0> (visible) or <t1>false</t1> (invisible).
可以通过设置这个变量的值的<t0>true</t0> (可见) or <t1>false</t1> (不可见)，来“打开”或“关闭”一个视野。
You can also specify the precision for the curves (default is 4) which can be from 1 to 8 with 8 being the smoothest.
同时你可以设置曲线的平滑程度（默认是4），范围是1至8，其中8最为平滑。

You can also split the main watch area into multiple windows using the "Split" option from the top window bar, permitting you to organise the layout to suit your needs (and these layouts can also be saved through the "Window" drop down menu).
你也可以使用窗口顶端的横条中的“Split”功能把主窗口区域划分成多个窗口，这个操作允许你组织布局来满足你的需求（而这些布局也可以通过顶端下拉菜单“Window”来存储）。
You can also upload these files to the different hosting services for individual distribution or to online stores (like Google Play, iTunes or the MS Store) for general distribution and retail.<br0>
你也可以上传这些文件到不同主机服务器或在线商店 (如 Google Play、iTunes 或 MS Store) 发布和销售。
You can also use a time line to control your game more globally.
你也可以更加全局化的用时间轴来控制你的游戏。
You can also use variables, as long as the variable in question has stored a valid <b4>instance id</b4>.
你也可以使用变量，只要这个变储存一个有效的<b4>instance id（实例ID）</b4>。
You can assign your audio file to a specific <b0>Audio group</b0>.
你可以将你的音频文件分到一个特定的 <b0>Audio group (音频组)</b0>。

You can change the name of a resource (except the top level ones that show the type of resource contained within) by selecting it once with a single click, and then giving another single click on the name once again.
你可以通过单击选中然后再次单击的方式更改资源的名字 (除了资源树顶级的资源类型名称)。
You can change the order of the resources by clicking on a specific resource and then dragging it to the appropriate place within its resource group.
你可以选中一个资源然后拖到适当的位置来改变排序。
You can change views easily by clicking the drop-down tab on the right and selecting the option you require.
你能通过在右侧点击下拉选项卡来改变视觉效果，选择你需要的选项。

You can check the return value of this function too as a debug tool to check whether the surface target was set or not, with a return value of 0 being a failure to set the target and any other positive value being a success.<br3>
你可以检测这个函数的返回值作为一个调试工具，判断是否成功设置了一个表面层目标，0表示设置目标表面失败，其它的正值都代表成功。<br3>

You can click any point of a path and then drag the mouse to move it around in the editor, although be aware that the green <i4>path start position</i4> is not directly selectable as it changes position automatically depending on whether the path is smooth or not (more on this further down).
你可以点击任何一个路径点然后拖动鼠标来改变这个点的位置，不过要注意的是绿色的<i4>路径起点</i4>是不能直接在这里改变位置的，它会根据你的路径是否平滑而自动改变它的位置。
You can create your own sprites in <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> or load them from files and use them "as is" or edit them yourself with the powerful <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> sprite editor.
你可以在 <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> 里创建自己的精灵或从文件加载或者自己用强大的 <i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> 精灵编辑器制作。
You can delete them (clear all of them so that you can create a new watch layout), or save the current layout or load a previously saved layout.
你可以把它们全删掉（把它们全部清理掉你就能获得一个全新的窗口布局），或者把当前的布局存起来再或者读取以前存储的布局。
You can do this using a number of consecutive <a0>"if"</a0> statements but when the possible choices gets above two or three it is usually easier to use the "switch" statement.
通常可以使用多个连续的 <a0>"if"</a0> 语句，但如果选项在两、三个以上时，“switch”语句使用起来更容易。
You can either use a customizable block pattern, or a solid fill colour which you can change by clicking on the colour selector box.
你可以使用自定义的块模式或者通过点击颜色选择框用纯色填充颜色。
You can even mix Drag'n'Drop with code!
此外，GML代码块能与按钮混用！
You can find descriptions of all the functions available in GML as well as an overview of how they can be used along with examples of code using them.
你可以找到所有可用GML函数的描述，以及如何在代码中使用的例子。
You can find further information about this from the <a0>YoYo Games Knowledge Base</a0> as well as on the individual target module <a1>Global Game Settings</a1> pages detailed in this manual.
你可以在 <a0>YoYo Games 知识库</a0> 里找到更多的信息，同时在本手册的个人目标模块 <a1>Global Game Settings</a1> 页面会作详细描述。
You can find out more information about the GameMaker: Player target platform from the YoYo Games Knowledge Base - <a2>GameMaker: Player</a2>.<br3>
更多关于 <a2>GameMaker: Player</a2> 平台的信息可以在 YoYo Games 知识库找到。<br3>
You can find out more information on accessors and how they work, along with an example for arrays, from the following page:
关于它的用法，访问器这一节可以找到更多的信息和数组的例子，详情访下面的页面：
You can get a copy of the SDK <a5>here</a5>.
您可以在 <a5>here</a5> 获得SDK。.

You can get the ID for the notification to cancel using the functions <a0><t1>push_get_first_local_notification()</t1></a0> and <a2><t3>push_get_next_local_notification()</t3></a2> and the function will return <t4>true</t4> on success or <t5>false</t5> otherwise (for example if the notification does not exist or has already been triggered).<br6>
你可以获得所取消的通知的ID通过使用函数 <a0><t1>push_get_first_local_notification()</t1></a0> 和 <a2><t3>push_get_next_local_notification()</t3></a2> ，函数将在成功时返回 <t4>true</t4> 其他情况返回 <t5>false</t5> （例如通知不存在或者已经被触发）。<br6>
You can have included files however, and you need not worry about whether your games will work on Mac OS X, Ubuntu (Linux) or Windows as that side of things is handled by <b2>Steam</b2>.
你可以包含文件，不需要考虑你的游戏是在 Mac OS X、Ubuntu (Linux) 还是 Windows 上工作，<b2>Steam</b2> 为你做好了一切。
You can import and create images and sounds to use in objects, and then instantly see the results of your actions at the press of a button.
可以导入或者创建用于物体的图像和声音，然后在按下按钮的时候您就可以立即看到结果。
You can of course export a *.gmz file and let them use <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> to play it but this is normally not what you want!
当然你可以导出 *.gmz 资源文件并且让他们使用 <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0> 来玩你的游戏，但是这通常并不是你想要的！
You can only use this command when the file has been changed and, again, there is a tool-bar button for this.
当文件被修改只能使用此按钮，工具栏上也有相同的按钮。

You can reset the GUI layer at any time to the default configuration by calling this function using -1 as both the width and height - this will set the (0, 0) position to the application surface and the width and height will be reset to 1:1 with the surface too.<br6>
通过调用这个函数，设置宽和高为-1，你可以在任何时间重置GUI层为默认设置。这个操作将设置GUI层至应用表面左上角的(0,0)坐标，宽和高重置应用表面相同的大小。<br6>
You can see the memory use, or how the GML is performing on the CPU, or a combination of both.
你可以查看内存使用，或者GML在CPU中是如何表现的，或者二者结合。
You can select any buffer created by setting the <i0>Buffer ID</i0> value, which will start at 0 for the first buffer created in your game, and increment by 1 for each consecutive buffer.
你可以选择任一使用<i0>缓冲ID</i0>的值产生的缓冲器，其中缓冲ID对第一个缓冲器是从0开始的，接下来的缓冲器每一个的ID加1。
You can select from textures or surfaces from the top of the watch, and then select the texture or surface ID to have it displayed in the window.
你可以在视图顶端选择材质还是表面，然后选择材质或表面的ID让它显示在窗口中。
You can set the <b0>Depth</b0> of the instances of an object, which basically controls whether they go below or above other objects at other depths.
你可以为物体的实例设置 <b0>深度</b0>，用来控制实例是位于其他实例之上还是之下，

You can set the view to follow a specific instance using the <a0><t1>view_object</t1></a0> variable (or in the <a2>room editor</a2>) and by setting this value you can control how near or far from the edge of the view the instance needs to be before the view will move.
你可以使用变量 <a0><t1>view_object</t1></a0> 设置视野跟随指定的实例 (或者在 <a2>房间编辑器</a2>中设置)，然后设置这个值控制实例需要移动多远或多近视野才会移动。
You can specify a local x and y position to copy from as well as the width and height of the section.
你可以指定源表面复制区域的局部x和y坐标，以及选区的宽度和高度。

You can start the Debug Module by running your game from <i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1> using the <i2>red</i2>"Play" button at the top of the IDE, or by going to the <b3>Run</b3> menu and selecting "Run in Debug Mode".
你可以在<i1>GameMaker: Studio</i1>中，点击位于IDE的顶部的<i2>红色</i2>"Play" 按钮来启动你的游戏以进入调试模块，或者通过点击 <b3>Run</b3>菜单中的“Run in Debug Mode”来启动。
You can then drag this point to get it to the position you wish.
然后你可以拖动这个新插入的点到你想要的位置上去。

You can use code in a number of places within <i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0>, from objects, to rooms and instances, and there are a number of built in functions that make your life easier when programming, however it is often necessary for you to create your <i1>own</i1> functions to do a specific task, or to condense a large section of code into a more manageable chunk, or even to be able to re-use a particular code block in many different places.
在<i0>GameMaker: Studio</i0>里，无论是对象还是房间和实例，你可以在各种地方使用代码，同时软件提供的大量内建函数可以让你编写游戏更加方便有效，但是在有些时候，创建属于你 <i1>自己的</i1>函数是非常有用的。无论是用来完成某些特殊的功能，或者只是用来让你的代码看起来更整洁更有条理，又或者你想要在游戏的多个地方执行相同的代码，脚本都是你的不二选择。
You can use code within object events to control the behaviour and interactions of instances of those objects.
在对象事件中加入GML代码，你能够更好的控制这个对象的行为，或者与其他对象的交互。
You can use this function to enable or disable the application surface at any time in your game, but you should note that it requires at least one frame (step) for the changes to take effect.
你可以游戏中的任何时间使用这个函数启用或禁用应用表面层，但应该注意更改生效至少需要一帧（一步）。
You can use this function to enable or disable the automatic drawing of the application surface.
你可以使用这个函数决定允许或者不允许应用表面层的自动绘制。
You can, however, change the character range used to help optimise your games ie: If you only need the numbers from a specific font, then <i15>only</i15> select the numbers.
不过你可以通过改变这个字符的范围来优化你的游戏，比如如果你某种字体只用来显示数字，那么你可以<i15>仅仅</i15>选择那些数字对应的范围。
You cannot use MIDI any longer and any imported files from legacy versions which use these may cause the program to crash.
你不能再使用 MIDI，并且从老版本中导入这些文件可能会导致程序崩溃。
You could even set an alarm in the time line so that it is repeated after a certain length of time and in this way your guard can patrol an area!<br5>
你甚至可以在时间轴中操作一个定时事件，这样这个事件就会每隔一定时间执行一次。现在你的守卫就可以在一个区域里巡逻了！<br5>

未能成功登陆到给定的云服务。

你可能觉得通过以下的代码片段就能简单实例：
You must indicate the moment, which is the number of steps since the time line was started.
你必须指定一个从时间轴开始之后的游戏步数。
You must indicate the start of the range, the end of the range, and the new time step to which the start of the range must be shifted.
你必须指定起始和结束的时刻范围，以及新的范围的起始时刻。
You must indicate the time step of the first moment to delete and the last one.
你必须设定要删除的时刻范围的起始与结束时刻。
You must then send this registration id to your server, and every device that your game is installed on will have a different registration id.
你必须发送这个注册ID（registration id）到你的服务器，每个设备都拥有独一无二的注册ID（registration id）。
You must use <b2>either</b2> <t3>argument0...15</t3> <b4>or</b4> argument[0...15]</i0>.
你必须 <b2>要么</b2> 使用<t3>argument0...15</t3> <b4>，要么使用</b4> argument[0...15]</i0>。

本质上数组就是一个存储许多数值的一个容器，其中的每个数据在这个容器中都有一个对应的编号，我们把这个编号放在两个中括号“[]”中。
You should <b1>ALWAYS</b1> check that a surface exists using <a2><t3>surface_exists</t3></a2> before referencing them directly.
在直接引用它们之前，你需要 <b1>一直</b1>使用 <a2><t3>surface_exists</t3></a2>检测表面层是否退出。

You should <b5>ALWAYS</b5> check that a surface exists using <a6><t7>surface_exists</t7></a6> before referencing them directly.
在直接引用它们之前，你需要 <b5>一直</b5> 使用 <a6><t7>surface_exists</t7></a6> 检测表面层是否退出。
You should <b7>ALWAYS</b7> check that a surface exists using <a8><t9>surface_exists</t9></a8> before referencing them directly.
在直接引用它们之前，你需要 <b7>一直</b7> 使用 <a8><t9>surface_exists</t9></a8>检测表面层是否退出。

You should also be aware that backgrounds in <i16>GameMaker: Studio</i16> are designed to tile and this means they have overlapping pixels on either side, so if you see any strange artefacts (transparent lines, extra pixels, etc.) then you should possibly be using sprites instead for the graphical effect you wish to achieve.<br17>
你应该知道 <i16>GameMaker: Studio</i16> 里的背景是为了磁贴设计的，这意味着它们的两边有重复的像素，所以如果你看到了奇怪的东西 (透明线、额外的像素等等) 尽可能使用精灵替代这些图形效果以达到目的。<br17>
You should also be aware that the games uploaded to the workshop cannot make use of extensions in any form as <b1>Steam</b1> consider them to be a security risk.
你要知道 <b1>Steam</b1> 考虑的是安全问题。
You should also realise that nothing will be seen if the surface itself is not drawn on the screen in the draw event of an instance.
还需要知道的是，还需要在实例的绘制事件中绘制才可以看到表面层的内容。
You should also realise that nothing will be seen if the surface itself is not drawn on the screen in the draw event of an instance.<br3>
还需要知道的是，还需要在实例的绘制事件中绘制才可以看到表面层的内容。<br3>

You should note that this function is limited to <b1>one</b1> single data "blob" per game, so every time you send a new save to the cloud service, whether it is a string or a file, it will over-write any previously stored data.<br2>
需要注意的是这个函数在每个游戏中被限制使用 <b1>一个</b1> 单一的"二进制"数据, 每当你发送一个新的保存请求到云服务器时，要确认它是一个字符串还是一个文件，因为它将覆盖你先前提交的任何已存储的数据。<br2>

在操作之前会被警告。.

你将会注意这个数组是<i0>倒序</i0>初始化的，最后一个位置是首先定义的。

the above code will check the variable "shake" and if it returns <t0>true</t0>, it will then change the view[0] angle to a random value between -10 and 10 every step until the variable returns <t1>false</t1>, at which time it will return the view[0] angle to 0º.
上述代码将检测变量“shake”，如果返回<t0>true</t0>，它将每步改变视野view[0] 角度为-10 至 10 之间的随机值，直到那个“shake”返回 <t1>false</t1>，此时 view[0] 角度将返回为 0º。
